, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The political parties\nstopped using the word \"bandh\" after the Kerala High Court banned it\nin the end of 1990s. The bandhs didn't stop though; they were just replaced\nwith the word \"hartal\". The judiciary is happy with this arrangement<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A day before a hartal (\nusually just before a weekend ) sales peak at the wine shops and fish and\npoultry outlets do brisk business as Malayalis prepare for the day's\ncelebrations. People stay indoors only because of fear of a stone on their head\nor car windshield. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A state wide hartal in\nKerala costs 1400 crores loss to the state.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NEXT TIME YOU SEES A\nMALAYALI HE MUST ASK HIM-- WHAT IS ATTI MARI AND NOKKU KOOLI .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The political GOONS (\nwho enforce bandhs ) are called ATTIMARI gang .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ATTIMARI is an extortion\nsystem of wages that headload workers\u2019 unions in Kerala imposed for\nloading/unloading goods from lorries . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They are supported by Congress/\nCommunist kerala politicians and they do the vendetta during bandhs .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you use outside\nworkers, the union insists on a compensation, NOKKU KOOLI, literally, wages for\njust looking on from the sidelines . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS IS FOR DENYING\nTHEM THE RIGHT TO WORK .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They will NEVER touch\ndirty cargo like cement and manure bags\u2014they convert this to PAY UP FOR FORCING\nUS TO WATCH .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; I\u2019ll deal with the bad wench myself\n- <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TEE HEEEE !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He wasn\u2019t amused to\nlearn that attimari was not some woman, but a blighted practice unions, chiefly\ncontrolled by the soulless communists , who have bullied Kerala into accepting\nas the norm .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The average Keralite\ndreads these people . they can play VERY dirty if you do NOT pay up the exorbitant\namount demanded .&nbsp; Police and judiciary\nkeep away.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These POLITICAL GOONDA\nworkers barge into your house while loading/ unloading and even your privacy is\ncompromised for they look everywhere . They stare at your wives and daughters .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Kerala Loading and\nUnloading (Regulation of Wages and Restriction of Unlawful Practices) Act,\n2002, states that attimari rates are to be regulated by the government and that\nnokkukooli is unlawful .</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But successive\ngovernments have done nothing to enforce the law and end the practice. For\nthese are goondas used by MP and MLA to settle scores and break legs and knee\ncaps .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The unions of the\nROTHSCHILD CONTROLLED Left parties ( YES\u2014EVEN NOW ) were most forceful in extracting\nattimari and nokkukooli.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Senior CPM leaders\nspake - Eradicating nokkukooli is fine, but we will not allow that to become a\npretext for exploiting workers .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now with mobile phone\nsystem they lurk in the shadows and ambush you even if you shift house at\nmidnight . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The attimari people set\nup camp near supermarkets to extort. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Modi government has\nrelaxed FDI norms for the insurance sector by permitting KOSHER overseas\ncompanies ( all Jew Rothschild owned ) to buy 49% cent stake in domestic\ninsurers without prior approval. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All this is a pound of flesh\nfrom Bharatmata\u2019s chest for APCO kosher branding .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Can you imagine\nBilderberg Club used retired US president George Bush to come to India and push\nFDI in insurance .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/shrewd-club-within-naive-bilderberg.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/shrewd-club-within-naive-bilderberg.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">India currently has 21\noperating nuclear reactors at six locations across the country, their combined\ncapacity totaling 5.8 GW. Its civil nuclear strategy has proceeded largely\nwithout fuel or technological assistance from other countries for more than 30\nyears.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This was a result of its Peaceful Nuclear Explosion (PNE) in 1974 and\nits voluntary exclusion from the Non-Proliferation Treaty (NPT), which led to\nIndia\u2019s isolation from trade in nuclear power plant materials. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, the scope for\ncivilian nuclear trade increased significantly beginning in September 2008,\nfollowing the Nuclear Suppliers Group (NSG) India-specific agreement. Civil\nnuclear cooperation agreements have since been signed with the US, Russia, France,\nAustralia and Kazakhstan, among other countries.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Scheduled Tribes\nand Other Traditional Forest Dwellers (Recognition of Forest Rights) Act, 2006,\nis a key piece of forest legislation passed in India on 18 December 2006.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It has also been called\nthe Forest Rights Act, the Tribal Rights Act, the Tribal Bill, and the Tribal\nLand Act. The law concerns the rights of forest-dwelling communities to land\nand other resources.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nearly 250 million\npeople live in and around forests in India, of which the estimated indigenous\nAdivasi or tribal population stands at about 100 million.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To put these numbers\nin perspective, if considered a nation by themselves, they would form the 13th\nlargest country in the world, even though they cannot be depicted as\nrepresenting any singular, monolithic culture.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Forests provide\nsustenance in the form of minor forest produce, water, grazing grounds and\nhabitat for shifting cultivation. Moreover, vast areas of land that may or may\nnot be forests are classified as \"forest\" under India's forest laws,\nand those cultivating these lands are technically cultivating \"forest\nland\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since times immemorial,\nthe tribal communities of India have had an integral and close knit\nrelationship with the forests and have been dependent on the forests for\nlivelihoods and existence. The relationship was mutually beneficial<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">India's forests are\ngoverned by two main laws, the Indian Forest Act, 1927 and the Wild Life\n(Protection) Act, 1972. The former empowers the government to declare any area\nto be a reserved forest, protected forest or village forest. The latter allows\nany area to be constituted as a \"protected area\", namely a national\npark, wildlife sanctuary, tiger reserve or community conservation area<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Under these laws, the\nrights of people living in or depending on the area to be declared as a forest\nor protected area are to be \"settled\" by a \"forest settlement\nofficer.\" This basically requires that officer to enquire into the claims\nof people to land, minor forest produce, etc., and, in the case of claims found\nto be valid, to allow them to continue or to extinguish them by paying\ncompensation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This blogsite demands\nthat the Modi Govt must amend the Forest Conservation Act (FCA),to curb the\nspread of Naxalites and their western white skinned sponsors.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just make sure OPEN Bauxite\nmining does NOT spoil access to CLEAN AIR AND WATER to the tribals. &nbsp;India can import Bauxite from other nations\ntill we break the spine of the Naxal movement<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Tensions\nexist between these states and the central government as well as amongst their\nnative tribal people and migrants from other parts of India.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Regional tensions\neased off in late 2014, with the Indian and state governments making a\nconcerted effort to raise the living standards of people in these regions. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is substantial\nmilitant activity in Tripura where AFSPA was withdrawn \u2013Yechhury was oasting\nabout it two days ago on TV. We did this\u2014we did that \u2013BHAAD mein gaye\nbharatmata.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Marx wrote that religion\nwould disappear naturally through the richness of ideas that would emerge from\na rationalized order of communistic social life. &nbsp;&nbsp;He believed that belief in the existence of\nGod was immoral and anti-human.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Engels kept harping on the need to cultivate\natheism all over the world.&nbsp; He called\nfor scientific education on a massive scale in order to overcome the fears and\nillusions of people who required a religious explanation for the world around\nthem.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He believed that science would provide an explanation for things that\npeople had formerly required religious concepts to fulfill, and by providing\nthis explanation, people would no longer feel a need to have religion for this\npurpose.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Do NOT ever think that these were freedom fighters\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIn February 1947, Dange again became the chairman of All India Trade Union Congress and continued to be at the helm of that organization either as general secretary or chairman\u2026<br />\n<br />\nOn the day India got freedom, in 15 August 1947 , our man SA Dange was in Moscow talking to the Soviet leaders\u2014for what?...<br />\n<br />\nIn 1951 four leaders travelled as stowaways from Calcutta port on a Russian ship from Calcutta. They were Ajoy Ghosh , S.A. Dange, C. Rajeswara Rao and M. Basava Punnaiah\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nAfter they came back Dange was elected to both the Central Committee and the Politburo\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nDange was elected to the 2nd Lok Sabha in 1957 from Bombay City (Central) Constituency of the State of Bombay, being such a darling of the masses\u2026<br />\n<br />\nDiaries of I.A. Benediktov, Russian ambassador to India during the 1960s named Indian communist leaders seeking aid from the Soviet Union. Dange's name figured in the first excerpt is from a 17 January 1962 entry from the journal Benediktov\u2026<br />\n<br />\nChristopher Andrew published, in 2005, a book Mitrokhin Archive II, that contained details of alleged transactions between the CPI and the KGB during 1975-76, and it claimed that the money exchanged was between 4 to 8 lakh rupees a month. ..<br />\n<br />\nKGB papers claim that deceased CPI leaders Dange and C. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 22.4px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_3M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/07/tank-cleaning-tips-for-special-cargoes.html?showComment=1405958078431#c8539522796677917568\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">July 21, 2014 at 9:24 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_3MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSTOP PRESS:<br />\n<br />\nFormer CJI KG Balakrishnan on Monday hit back at Press Council of India chairman Markandey Katju, terming as \"completely baseless\" his allegations that he and two other ex-CJIs made \"improper compromises\" in retaining a Tamil Nadu judge under corruption cloud during UPA rule.<br />\n<br />\nS. Ashok Kumar, a district judge in Tamil Nadu who converted from Christianity back to Hinduism, states: \"You can change your religion but never your caste. Even if you are an nth generation Christian or Muslim, you have to have a caste identity when you revert to Hinduism. I had to return as a scheduled caste.\" What is worse, \u2018reverts\u2019 are not accepted as \u2018real Hindus\u2019 and separate \"Swastik Temples\" are specially created for them. So you see, you are born a Hindu or you die one, but you cannot become one - that is impossible.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">K G Balakrishnan's father was one Mr Lookose who changed his name as Gopinathan to usurp the benefits of SC-ST Hindus</span>. A Memorandum was submitted by Kerala SC-ST Federation in 2006 to Indian President and copy of it were given to Prime Minister and CBI Director with full evidences that K G Balakrishnan is a Crypto christian who grabbed the benefits of genuine SC-ST Hindus. <span style=\"color: red;\">K G Balakrishnan was made High Court judge with special recruitment by former dalit president K R Narayanan.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\nKonakuppakatil Gopinathan Balakrishnan, also known as K. G. Balakrishnan, was chief justice of India from 14-1- 2007 to 12-5-2010. &nbsp; <span style=\"color: blue;\">KG Balakrishnan was illegally appointed to the Kerala High Court in 1985 though he did not fulfil the requirement laid down in the Constitution for appointment as a High Court judge. It is mandatory for a person to have a minimum of 10 years service as a District Judge or 10 years practice as an Advocate before being elevated to the High Court. KG Balakrishnan had worked merely as a Munsif Magistrate from 1973 to 1983, a post which is subordinate judiciary and, hence, rendered him ineligible for the High Court Judge\u2019s post. Since his original appointment as High Court judge was it self illegal, his subsequent elevation as Chief Justice of India was also illegal. </span>Balakrishnan, is currently chairperson of National Human Rights Commission.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Getting back\u2014</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As per the\nunderstanding, YSR stopped the anti-Naxal operations in the name of\n\u2018peace-talks\u2019 and allowed them to regroup and roam the state freely with arms\nand ammunition.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Naxal and PWG utilized this huge opportunity to establish\ncontacts with Maoists in other states and Nepal. No journalist dared to report\n, as those who tried lost their lives.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As a result, the Red\ncorridor spread to over 15 states across India, from Nepal to Andhra Pradesh.\nThe unholy nexus extended to LTTE cadres and Jihadis, resulting in smuggling of\ndifferent kinds of arms and ammunition, including rocket launchers, and parts\nfor making bombs, etc.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The huge cache of arms and ammunitions captured by Tamil\nNadu police during their regular arrests of LTTE cadres established the\nNaxal-LTTE nexus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BUT UNKNOWN TO ALL\nMAOISTS AND NAXALITES THRIVED IN HIS RULE. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Naidu alleged that YSR did political murders\nusing mMaoists and had given shelter to the Maoist leaders who attempted to\nkill him (Naidu) at Alipiri in 2003.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In October 2002\nCPI(ML)PW issued a declaration containing death threats against the Chief\nMinister of three Indian states; Buddhadev Bhattacharya, Chandrababu Naidu and\nBabulal Marandi.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Exactly a year later,\nthe organization conducted an assassination attempt against Chandrababu Naidu.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 21 September 2004\nCPI(ML)PW merged with Maoist Communist Centre of India to form Communist Party\nof India (Maoist).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In November 2004 a mass\nrally of some 150,000 people was held in Hyderabad in support of CPI(ML)PW (the\nmerger into CPI(Maoist) had not yet been made public at this point).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In December 2004\nCPI(ML)PW and all its front organisations were banned as a 'terrorist\norganisation' under the Unlawful Activities (Prevention) Amendment Act, 2004.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Naxals have given YSR\nsufficient warning.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They were peeved when\nhe kept quiet when the Govt of India wanted them to lay down their arms.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Nov 2004 , the police\ndenied permission to the CPI (Maoist) to hold meetings at Chimakurthi and\nInkollu in Prakasam district to be addressed by senior leaders like Varavara\nRao and Gaddar . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The CPI (Maoist)\nsympathisers had constructed pylons at Chimakurthi and Inkollu ( made on\ngrabbed Govt lands) &nbsp;in memory of martyrs\nand invited senior leaders to unveil them . &nbsp;&nbsp;It was construed as a great let down by YSR. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YSR had developed cold\nfeet because there were accusations that he was sponsoring the Maoists . &nbsp;Rajya Sabha MP P.C. Alexander alleged that\npoliticians were also responsible in the spread of Naxalism in Andhra , by\nencouraging one faction against the other.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The BJP president, L.K.\nAdvani, publicly urged the Prime Minister, Manmohan Singh, to reconsider the\npolicy on dealing with naxalites and asked him to evolve a new policy. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">LK Advani knew the DOUBLE GAME played by YSR\nto garner armed militant support for his selfish personal agenda .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Advani said that the approach to the problem\nin Andhra Pradesh has endangered the internal security of the country. &nbsp; The\nUnion Government, he said, had committed a \"fundamental mistake\" by\nallowing the YSR led Andhra Pradesh Government to deal with the naxalite\nproblem the way it liked. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YSR was CM of Andhra\nfrom May 2004 till his death in Sept 2009.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The CPI (Maoist) and\nthe CPI-ML (Janashakti) have given the YSR Government time till the first week\nof &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">January 2005, to launch\ndistribution of surplus, forest and temple lands to the poor failing which Maoists\ne will forcibly occupy them.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Maoist secretary, Ramakrishna, and the Janashakti\nsecretary, Amar, in a joint statement said they took this decision on the basis\nof an appeal by the Committee for Concerned Citizens, mediators, democratic\norganisations and</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">individuals.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">They\nwanted the YSR Government to come out with modalities of the land distribution.\nYSR indeed did what was required and became very popular. He knew that land\ndistribution was the key to becoming a strong CM.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In December&nbsp; 2004 , CPI Maoist leaders for the first time\never &nbsp;openly attacked the Rajasekhara\nReddy government for pursuing `repressive' policies of previous TDP regime. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Peeved over police denying permission to hold a public meeting at Asifabad, the\nMaoists warned the YSR Congress government for going back on its promise of\nfree speech to Naxalites.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">OUR CONSTITUTION DOES NOT GIVE FREE SPEECH TO TRAITORS WHO WANT TO BLEED AND KILL BHARATMATA&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Andhra more than 51 lakh\nacres of land have been assigned to the landless poor ( commies ) &nbsp;since the 1960s, a significant percentage of\nthe said land is not in possession of the poor, because they sold it back to\ncommie land lord ministers\u2014who have changed parties and gone over to Congress,\nTDP, TRS , BJP etc<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These minister are\nholding on to the land without proper documents . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The CRIMINAL Bhoodan\nMovement of Vinobha Bhave to regularize these shady land grab \u2013subdivide and\ndistribute &nbsp;\u2014recapture and merge -- dealings\nare no more.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Telengana thousands\nof acres of Inami lands are still unsettled. 50% of lands in coastal areas are\ngiven on lease and almost 100% of lease is informal. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Land purchasers of\nlakhs of acres of patta land through plain paper transactions (75% of whom are\npoor) are not recognised as legal owner of the lands.&nbsp; &nbsp;Both\nthese phenomena have contributed significantly to the downward curve in agricultural\nproductivity in AP and lowered the GDP of the nation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The public hearing\nconducted by the Land Committee revealed evidence of lands which are assignable\nbut not assigned; land assigned on paper but physical position not shown; lands\nin occupation of the poor for ages but patta not given; and ineffective\nimplementation of Assigned Land (Prohibition of Transfer) Act, 1977. There are\nhuge tracts of lanka land situated in the upper and lower streams of the\nGodavari and Krishna river basin. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These lands are\noperated through \u201csocieties\u201d. Most of the societies are either defunct now or\nbeing managed by big ex-commie politician landlords. Encroachers are increasing\nand some societies are even alienating these lands to third party.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">TO CATCH AND PUNISH THE\nLAND GRABBERS , WE ASK THE MODI GOVT TO COMPUTERISE ALL LAND RECORDS .&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">PUT THE\nBEST BRAINS AND THE MOST DETERMINED PEOPLE ON THE JOB.. &nbsp; &nbsp;PAY THEM WELL .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">CATCH THESE BASTARD POLITICAN LANDLORDS WHO HAVE BOUGHT SUBDIVIDED GRABBED LAND FROM COMMIE PEASANTS AT THROWAWAY PRICES.</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">GIVE BACK GRABBED LANDS TO TEMPLES -- ESPECIALLY IN KERALA WHERE 95% OF AYURVEDIC HERBS ARE MISSING .</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://www.newindianexpress.com/states/telangana/AP-land-grabbing-act-repealed/2016/06/02/article3462229.ece\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.newindianexpress.com/states/telangana/AP-land-grabbing-act-repealed/2016/06/02/article3462229.ece</a><o:p></o:p><br />\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Modi Govt must investigate\nthe CRIMINAL Bhoodan movement of Chitpavan Jew nay Brahmin Vinobha Bhave to regularize\ngrabbed lands without land records. The Bhoodan land created many landowning\ncommie politicians who were all paupers before.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Despite specific\ndirections of the Supreme Court for disposal of endowment land (temple land)\nthe auctions are held in secret and sold to private parties for small amounts\nof money, and the same is the case with endowment land given on lease. In all\nthe Telengana districts, thousands of hectares of inam land under the\noccupation of poor without titles came to the vested with the Government after\nthe abolition of Inams.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YOU HAVE NO IDEA ,\nABOUT THE EXTENT OF CORRUPTION WHEN YOU GO TO REGISTER LAND IN GOVT LAND\nREGISTRY OFFICES. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SAB MIL BHAANTKE KHAATE\nHEIN.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE DOCUMENT WRITER IS\nTHE PIMP USUALLY - - &nbsp;WHAT YOU GIVE HIM GOES BY PERCENTAGE RIGHT UPWARDS TO THE REGISTRAR AND ANTI-CORRUPTION VIGILANCE OFFICER &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;( WHOSE PHONE NUMBER IS ON A PLACARD AT THE ENTRANCE &nbsp;OF THE LAND REGISTRY OFFICE ) .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">IF YOU DO NOT GIVE WHAT HE WANTS, YOUR ENTIRE DOCUMENT MAY\nBE MISPLACED OR LOST OR REGISTERED IN SOMEONE ELSEs NAME .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THERE WAS A CASE IN CALICUT RECENTLY , &nbsp; WHERE A PRIME TRACT OF LAND WAS SOLD BY A ROGUE TO 17 BUYERS , HE COLLECTED THE MONEY AND SCOOTED. &nbsp; THE LAND HE SOLD FOR A HUMONGOUS AMOUNT , &nbsp;WAS NOT EVEN HIS .</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">In 1956, the Hyderabad\nstate was dissolved as part of the linguistic reorganisation of states and\nTelangana was merged with former Andhra State to form Andhra Pradesh. </b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The Telugu Commies\nwanted it to happen earlier. &nbsp;&nbsp;Alas-- &nbsp;by the time Nehru/ Patel had consolidated\npower over Telengana and crushed the traitor commies.<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">The Telugu commies\nwanted Vishalandhra ( with a sea port ) in consonance with the promise of\nBasava Punnaih and C Rajeshwara Rao to Stalin in 1951\u2014so that heavy tanks and\nguns could be landed from Russian ships \u2013to take over the whole of India by a\nbloody revolution.</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; His Ph.D. thesis was later published as a\nbook \"The Nature of Underdevelopment and Regional Structure of Nepal- A\nMarxist Analysis\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Following massive\npopular demonstrations and a prolonged civil war against the monarchy, the Communist\nParty of Nepal (Maoist) became the ruling party during the Nepalese Constituent\nAssembly election, 2008.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2001, the civil war\nescalated as the Maoists armed with foreign guns attacked the Nepalese Army for\nthe first time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nepalese Maoists had\nsent their delegates to the March 2001 Congress of PWG held at Abuz Marh in the\nBastar region of Chhattisgarh.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The establishment of\nCRZ-- Compact Revolutionary Zone -- gave a wider space and platform for all the\nproscribed Nepal and Indian Naxalite organizations to strengthen their bases in\nboth the countries.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In early 2008, the\nCPN(M) won the largest voting bloc in the Nepalese Constituent Assembly.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">International observers, like the Carter Center, said that the election was\nheld in a \"peaceful, orderly\" manner and were \"satisfying\"\u2014when\nin reality the elections were rigged.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2006, after signing\nan agreement with Nepal's major parties, the Maoists led public protests in\nNepal for 19 days, reminiscent of <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Anna Hazare's foreign sponsored protests</span>,\nwhich forced the king to step down.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Two years later, the Maoists emerged as the\nlargest party following a historical election and Bhattarai ( <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">like Khachrawaal</span>\n) won the highest number of votes, contesting from Gorkha.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Maoists announced a\n\u2018People's War\u2019 on 13 February 1996, under the slogan: \"Let us march ahead\non the path of struggle towards establishing the people's rule by wrecking the\nreactionary ruling system of state.\" Maoists strongly believe in the\nphilosophy of Mao Zedong who proclaimed, \"Political power grows out of the\nbarrel of a gun\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Retired mercenary Gorkha\nBrigade mercenaries were involved in training the Communist Party of Nepal\n(Maoist) insurgents<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nine months after he\nquit Nepal\u2019s biggest Maoist party, former Prime Minister Baburam Bhattarai\nlaunched a new political outfit on Sunday.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; She will lose her rights as a citizen of J&amp;K. However, a man, even if he marries a person from outside the state, shall continue to enjoy his rights as a citizen of J&amp;K.<br />\n<br />\npunch into google search-<br />\nTHE KASHMIR DISPUTE VADAKAYIL<br />\n<br />\nit is high time we treat kashmir as just another state. there can be no referendum after the muslims have done ethnic cleansing, driven away all the kashmiri hindus ,usurped their ancestral lands and broken down their temples.<br />\n<br />\nArticle 370 of the Indian constitution is a law that grants special autonomous status to Jammu and Kashmir.<br />\n<br />\nThis article specifies that except for Defence, Foreign Affairs, Finance and Communications,(matters specified in the instrument of accession) the Indian Parliament needs the State Government's concurrence for applying all other laws.<br />\n<br />\nThus the state's residents lived under a separate set of laws, including those related to citizenship, ownership of property, and fundamental rights, as compared to other Indians.<br />\n<br />\nArticle 1 of the Constitution of Jammu and Kashmir states that the State of Jammu and Kashmir is and shall be an integral part of the Union of India. The constitution was adopted and enacted on 17 November 1956.<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">THE CONSTITUTION OF KASHMIR WAS JUST A TEMPORARY MEASURE </span></b>.<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">DID WE NOT KICK THE BACKSIDES OF THE SLOTHFUL PRINCES AND ABOLISH THE PRIVY PURSES ?</span></b><br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>pakistan aided terrorism is kashmir forces india to throw the kashmir constitution into the dust bin.</b></span><br />\nand abdullahs better keep their mouths shut -- or modi will throw them into jail, like how nehru threw his own half brother sheikh abdullah into jail.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">MODI MUST PUNISH ALL MUSLIM KASHMIRIS GUILTY OF DOING ETHNIC CLEANSING-- AS PER INDIAN LAW .</span></b><br />\nAND OF COURSE HE MUST PUNISH AND IMPRISON NDTV BOSSES, WHO HAVE GIVEN SPACE TO SEDITION MONGERS ON PRIME TIME .<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_64b+seedCdguD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_64b+seedCdguD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The attack on N.\nChandrababu Naidu by the PWG at Tirupati on&nbsp;\nOctober 1, 2003, &nbsp;shows long-term\nplanning. The PWG used World War II-vintage low-technology appropriately.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It\ndid not use either remote-triggers which could be jammed by electromagnetic\njammers, nor timers which would require precise forecasting of the exact second\nwhen Naidu\u2019s convoy would pass by.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Significantly, even the\ndeep search metal detectors used to survey Naidu\u2019s route failed to detect the\ngelatin Claymore mines packed with metal shrapnel. &nbsp;Nor did sniffer dogs, who had searched Naidu\u2019s\nentire route for several hours, manage to detect them. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An indicator of the\nPWG\u2019s meticulousness was that the Claymores had been planted at least two\nmonths prior to the attack, and thick grass had grown over them. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The PWG managed to dig\nup the earth from behind without disturbing the stone formation on the\nembankment at all and place the mines inside. &nbsp;&nbsp;The&nbsp;\nNaxals knew months in advance that Naidu would be travelling on that\nroad on October 1 to attend an annual religious function.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Naidu survived only\nbecause the Claymores were planted horizontally perpendicular to the road on\nembankments, and his Level-3 bulletproof Ambassador withstood the sideways\nblasts. But whereas the shells of such cars are heavily armoured with steel\nplates, their undersides continue to be practically unprotected. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the PWG had used a\nmine or explosive planted underneath the road surface \u2014 as the militants in\nKashmir do \u2014 Naidu may not have been so lucky. PWG units in tribal areas of\nOrissa, Jharkhand and Chhattisgarh also possess similar expertise in land\nmines.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"line-height: 250%;\">When China attacked India in 1962, the commie leader <span style=\"background-color: orange;\">bastards</span>\nspread the propaganda that Chinese </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\">forces were here to 'liberate' India from\ncapitalist bourgeois domination and establish a heavenly kingdom for the\nproletariat . &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; International</td></tr>\n<tr><td>2</td><td>Khalistan Commando Force</td></tr>\n<tr><td>3</td><td>Khalistan Zindabad Force</td></tr>\n<tr><td>4</td><td>International Sikh Youth
