(ABNES)</td></tr>\n<tr><td>33</td><td>Organisations listed in the Schedule to the U.N. Prevention and Suppression of Terrorism (Implementation of Security Council Resolutions) Order, 2007 made under section 2 of the United Nations (Security Council) Act, 1947 and amended from time to time.</td></tr>\n<tr><td>34</td><td>Communist Party of India (Maoist) all its formations and front organizations.</td></tr>\n<tr><td>35</td><td>Indian Mujahideen, all its formations and front organizations.</td></tr>\n<tr><td>36</td><td>Garo National Liberation Army (GNLA), all its formations and front organizations.</td></tr>\n<tr><td>37</td><td>Kamatapur Liberation Organization, all its formations and front organizations.</td></tr>\n<tr><td>38</td><td>Islamic State/Islamic State of Iraq and Levant /Islamic State of Iraq and Syria/Daish, and all its Manifestations</td></tr>\n<tr><td>39</td><td>National Socialist Council of Nagaland (Khaplang), NSCN (K), all its formations and front organizations</td></tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<div style=\"background-color: #ededec; font-family: verdana; font-size: 11.2px; line-height: 15.68px; margin-bottom: 0.9em; margin-top: 0.5em;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A few minutes ago\nCommie Sitaram Yechury was boasting to Barkha Dutt that the commies have lifted\nAFSPA is Tripura .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He must know that only the Union Home Minister Rajnath Singh\ncan do that \u2013 NOT his commie CM or Party leader. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Well armed &nbsp;Maoists await as sleeper cells in Tripura. &nbsp;</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maoists do not select\nan area randomly. Instead, they first select a strategic area, which should be\n\u201csufficiently large so as to have enough room for manoeuvre in face of severe\nenemy offensive.\u201d &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It must be easy for\nair drops of ammmuntion /guns and for smuggling across borders.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thereafter,\nthey conduct a socio-politico-economic-geographical study of the selected area.\nThis is called, in Maoist parlance, \u201csocial investigation\u201d to decide with whom\nto unite and whom to target.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And then, they identify\nmajor political issues to mobilize the masses. Simultaneously, they undertake a\nconcrete study of the \u2018terrain\u2019 to check its feasibility for guerrilla warfare.\nEventually, they form front/cover/mass organisations to spearhead their\nso-called struggle.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So, at the initial stage, they employ the instruments of\ninvestigation, propaganda, organisation and struggle to establish bases in the\nselected areas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In terms of\ngeographical area, it is \u2018sufficiently\u2019 large. The combined area of the\nNortheast is about 255083 sq. km. i.e. 7.7 percent of the total area of the\ncountry. The terrain of the region is mostly hilly which is altogether\nfavourable to guerrilla warfare. &nbsp;For\nMaoists, strategic areas are those which are predominantly \u201chilly regions with\ndense forest cover.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In terms of percentage\nof forest cover with respect to total geographical area, it is 90.4 in Mizoram,\n80.4 in Arunachal Pradesh, 78.7 in Nagaland, 76.1 in Manipur, 77.18 in\nMeghalaya, 75.0 in Tripura and 35.3 in Assam. &nbsp;&nbsp;The forest cover of the Northeast accounts\nfor almost one fourth of the country\u2019s total forest cover.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So far as the\nsocio-economic indicators of the region are concerned, they are also in favour\nof Maoists\u2019 grand design. The level of poverty and unemployment aggravates the\n\u2018contradiction\u2019 and \u2018alienation\u2019 among the people of the region.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If one goes go by the\nHuman Development Index (HDI) of the region, it is 0.364 for Assam which is the\nlowest in the region, 0.427 for Arunachal Pradesh, 0.447 for Tripura, 0.455 for\nMeghalaya, 0.521 for Manipur, 0.570 for Nagaland and 0.584 for Mizoram.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Almost\n27 percent of the total population of the region is below the poverty line,\ni.e. 1.5 crore people.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE COMMIE\nLEADERS </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">DELIBERATELY KEEP PEOPLE BELOW\nTHE POVERTY LINE BY DRIVING AWAY INDUSTRIES-- AND BRAINWASH THE MASSES NOT TO HAVE LOVE FOR THE WATAN . .&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>ONCE PEOPLE COME ABOVE THE POVERTY LINE THEY HAVE NO NEED FOR COMMUNISM\n/ MAOISM .&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>THIS IS WHY NO INDUSTRY HAVE BEEN ABLE TO TAKE A FOOTHOLD IN KERALA &nbsp;( World head quarters of strikes and hartals ) &nbsp;AND BENGAL. &nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-s36UDoCmZq4/V83Ez6-CvZI/AAAAAAABLks/lM4cBIjadK4iAGhfRCQv6oAY7Vk_KeaSQCLcB/s1600/seast-map.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"496\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-s36UDoCmZq4/V83Ez6-CvZI/AAAAAAABLks/lM4cBIjadK4iAGhfRCQv6oAY7Vk_KeaSQCLcB/s640/seast-map.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maoists and separatist\noutfits of the NE including Tripura continue to go to Bangladesh for arm and\nbomb sabotage training.</span> &nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nbanned National Liberation Front of Tripura and the All Tripura Tiger Force\nhave been fighting for an independent tribal homeland in Tripura and operate\nout of Bangladesh, which surrounds the northeastern state on three sides. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>The intellectual blue\nprint goes from commie professors in JNU and JU.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tripura can get\nlogistic and monetary support from across the porous border with Bangladesh Safe\nhavens in Bangladesh, logistic support from the then solicitous Bangladesh\nestablishment and the external intelligence agencies based there, and\nnetworking with potential insurgent outfits aided it. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A build-up of weapons,\nexplosives and wireless communication systems, and extortion and \u201clevies,\u201d went\ninto the making of the volatile insurgency in Tripura in the past. Maoists can\nhide for months because of the rough terrain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since the 1990s, there is an\nongoing irredentist Tripura rebellion, involving militant outfits such as the\nNational Liberation Front of Tripura and the All Tripura Tiger Force (ATTF);\nterrorist incidents involving the ATTF claimed a recorded number of 389 victims\nin the seven-year period of 1993 to 2000.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Armed Forces\n(Special Powers) Act, 1958 (AFSPA) was first enforced in Tripura on 16 February\n1997 when terrorism was at its peak in the state. Ever since it was enforced in\nTripura, the Act, as per its provisions, was reviewed and extended after every\nsix months. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, in view of the\nimprovement in the situation and fewer terrorist activities being reported (\nMaoists are just lying low as sleeper cells ) , the Tripura government in June\n2013 reduced operational areas of the AFSPA to 30 police station areas. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The last six-month\nextension to AFSPA was given in November 2014, and after about 18 years of\noperation, it was repealed on 29 May 2015</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Commie Manik Sarkar has\nbeen Chief Minister of Tripura since March 1998. He is a Politburo Member of\nCommunist Party of India (Marxist.&nbsp; &nbsp;In assembly elections held in 2013, he became\nthe chief minister for the fourth consecutive time.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Alok Deb, 21, a a\nsecond-year student in the college and resident of Shantipara in Ambassa\nsubdivision, was dragged into a room by SFI activists who first beat him up and\nthen at least two SFI students urinated in his mouth. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Later, the SFI goons\nwere heard shouting that Alok Deb\u2019s mouth had become impure by saying \u2018Bharat\nMata ki Jai\u2019, hence they had purified him (by urinating in his mouth). The\nTripura CM since 1998, Manik Sarkar from CPI-M, has NOT commented on this\nincident. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The communists have\nfound allies in secular-liberals who act as their sympathizers in media and\ncivil society to create a false narrative that it is the Hindu desh bhakts who\nare fascist and intolerant.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>COMMIES SITARAM YECHURY ,\nPRAKASH KARAT AND D RAJA CAN SUCK ON THIS POST BELOW</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://economictimes.indiatimes.com/news/politics-and-nation/bjp-to-launch-agitation-in-tripura-following-manhandling-of-bjp-worker-by-sfi-member/articleshow/52282959.cms\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://economictimes.indiatimes.com/news/politics-and-nation/bjp-to-launch-agitation-in-tripura-following-manhandling-of-bjp-worker-by-sfi-member/articleshow/52282959.cms</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pritish Nandy spAke .\n\u201cI am a product of that coffee house culture,\u201d he says. \u201cI have patience with\nevery ideology, can listen to every voice, however angry or hysterical it may\nbe. I understand politics, art, music, theatre; I understand hope, justice,\nimagination, trust because I grew up there and met some of the finest thinkers\nof that time and shared their thoughts and ideas and understood what it was to\nbe young, brave, creative. They encouraged me to become who I am, who I wanted\nto be . I learnt more in the coffee house than I learnt at Presidency College. I\nmade more friends there than I made anywhere else in life. It taught me what\nthe open mind was. It taught me what it was to be Bengali, and therefore\nIndian. It was my home, my college, my university. It was the library where I\nsat and read the books of life, where I found so much that it will last me an\nentire lifetime.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Unitarian Church dictated terms to Brahmo Samaj.<br />\n<br />\nThe son of Pir Ali Muslim <span style=\"color: blue;\">Dwarknath Tagore </span>introduced Rothschild\u2019s Western esotericism, into Brahmo Samaj . The theology of the Brahmo Samaj was called \"neo-Vedanta\" by Christian commentators.<br />\n<br />\nRothschild\u2019s agent Keshub Chandra Sen, a Christian convert controlled his nephew Vivekananda and had him enrolled in his Nava Vidhan ( Nobobidhan ).<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">Keshab Chandra Sen</span> and Vivekananda incorporated Christian theology within the framework of Hindu thought.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">Keshab Chandra Sen</span> was Secretary to the Goodwill Fraternity, Masonic lodge associated with the Unitarian Rev.Charles Dall and a Christian missionary Rev. James Long .<br />\n<br />\nWith them Sen establish a TRAITOR \"British Indian Association\" filled with Bhadaraloks , Pir Ali \u201cbrahmins\u201d , white people and anglo Indians..<br />\n<br />\nIn 1866 Sen delivered an address on Jesus Christ, Europe and Asia, in which he proclaimed that \"India would be for Christ alone who already stalks the land\"<br />\n<br />\nOn 24th January 1868, <span style=\"color: red;\"><b>Keshub Chanda Sen </b></span>laid the foundation stone of his new church, the Brahmo Samaj of India Tabernacle of New Dispensation and the newly constructed chapel was consecrated on 22nd August 1869.<br />\n<br />\nSen declared, \"we believe in the Church Universal, which is the respiratory of all ancient wisdom and the receptacle of all modern science, which recognise in all prophets and saints a harmony, in all scriptures a unity and though all dispensations a continuity, which abjures all that separates and divides and always magnifies unity and peace, which harmonises reason, faith and Bhakti, asceticism and social duty in their highest forms and which shall make of all nations and sects one kingdom and one family in the fullness of time.\"<br />\n<br />\nAIYYOOOOOOO!<br />\n<br />\nVivekananda was a member of a Freemasonry lodge in 1883.<br />\n<br />\nRothschild published ( 1896 ) and propagated Vivekananda\u2019s book Raja Yoga.<br />\n<br />\nRothschild send Swami Vivekananda on his ship to represent Hinduism at the Parliament of Religions at Chicago on September 11th, 1893.<br />\n<br />\nFor the next three years Vivekananda would be shown to several western doctors in USA , England and Europe to treat his terrible diseases\u2014and all the while he lectured too.<br />\n<br />\nRothschild gave Narendra his new name Swami Vivekananda just before he boarded his ship in May 1893.<br />\n<br />\nCapt Ajit Vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rising global iron-ore\nprices driven by Chinese demand brought focus to the iron ore rich Bellary\nregion of Karnataka. This iron ore is alleged to have been illegally mined\nafter paying a minuscule royalty to the government. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The major regularities\ninvolve mines in Bellary, including those of Obulapuram Mining Company owned by\nG. Karunakara Reddy and G. Janardhana Reddy who were ministers in the\nGovernment of Karnataka at the time.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SOMETIMES NAXALISM IS\nDELIBERATELY &nbsp;INJECTED INTO A VAST MINERAL\nRICH AREA AND THEN POLITICIANS LOOT , WITH ALL IN CAHOOTS .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Maoist insurgency\nis controlled by enemy nations who want to wreck Indian economy. The private mining\nindustry in India are mostly run by foreign forces using Indian benami fronts. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Sorabjee served as member of the Permanent Court of Arbitration at The Hague from 2000 to 2006 .--- we know who sponsors this man . .<br />\n<br />\nSoli J. Sorabjee is also President of the United Lawyers Association, Vice-President of the Human Rights Committee of the International Bar Association, Vice-President of the Commonwealth Lawyers Association, Executive Committee member of the International Association of Constitutional Lawyers and member of the Committee on Arms Control and Disarmament Law of the International Law Association. He is also a Patron of the Media Legal Defence Initiative, a UK-based charity that provides legal aid and assistance to journalists and news media organizations around the world, supports training in media law and promotes the exchange of information, litigation tools and strategies for lawyers working on media freedom cases.<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">WE KNOW THIS MAN SOLI SORABJEE AND HIS SPONSORS .. .&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTHIS MAN SOLI SORABJEE WAS GIVEN INDIAs SECOND HIGHEST AWARD THE PADMA VIBHUSHAN<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE FOLLOWED EVERY WORD SOLI SORABJEE HAS SAID ON TV AND WRITTEN<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">WE DONT WANT SOLI SORABJEE TO SAVE INDIA. . .</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple; They made sure whoever were involved in harming white women were\ncaught alive.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They put them in a unventilated train carriage freshly painted\nwith toxic lead paint and transported them from Calicut to Coimbatore.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the\ncompartment was opened at the destination, they found the prisoners inside had\neaten each other in a frenzy of cannibalism.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The whole train wagon was full of\nblood and gouged out eyes.&nbsp; This is kept\na secret.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thousands of Hindu\nwomen were raped by these half breeds \u2013but commie cum Muslim &nbsp;historians ( a dangerous breed ) &nbsp;have white washed it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mrs Annie Besant wrote,\n\u201cMalabar has taught what Islamic rule means and we do not want to see another\nspecimen of Khilafat Raj in India\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Resolution passed in\nthe People\u2019s Conference presided by&nbsp;\nZamorin, Maharaja of Malabar, was held in 1921.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2018This Conference views\nwith indignation and sorrow the attempts made in various quarters by interested\nparties to ignore or minimise the crimes committed by the Moplah rebels such\nas:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; a) Brutality dishonouring women<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; b) Flaying people alive<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; c) Wholesale slaughter of men, women\nand children<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; d) Burning alive entire families<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; e) Forcibly converting people in\nthousands and slaying those who refused to get converted<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; f) Throwing half dead people into wells\nand leaving the victims for hours to struggle for escape till finally released\nfrom their suffering by death<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; g) Burning a great many and looting\npractically all Hindu and Christian houses in the disturbed areas in which even\nMoplah women and children took part and robbing women of even the garments on\ntheir bodies, in short, reducing the whole non-Muslim population to abject\ndestitution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; h) Cruelly insulting the religious\nsentiments of the Hindus by desecrating and destroying numerous temples in the\ndisturbed areas, killing cows within the temple precincts, putting their\nentrails on the holy image and hanging the skulls on the walls and roofs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Annie Besant visited\nthe affected areas of Malabar soon after the Moplah rebellion in 1921 and wrote\na series of powerful articles about the carnage let loose by the Moplah Muslims\nwhich opened the eyes of the government of India and that of Britain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Excerpts from her\nArticle Malabar\u2019s Agony<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2018The Khilafat Raj is\nestablished there; on 1 August, 1921, sharp to the date first announced by\nGandhi for the beginning of Swaraj and the vanishing of British Rule, a Police\nInspector was surrounded by Moplahs, revolting against that Rule. From that\ndate onwards thousands of the forbidden war knives were secretly made and\nhidden away and on 20 August, the rebellion broke out. Khilafat flags were\nhoisted on Police Stations and Government Offices. \u2026. Eyes full of appeal, and\nagonised despair, of hopeless entreaty of helpless anguish, thousands of them\ncamp after camp which I visited.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2018Words fail to express\nmy feelings of indignation and abhorrence which I experienced when I came to\nknow of an instance of rape, committed by the rebels under Chembrasseri\nThangal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A respectable Nair lady\nat Melathur was stripped naked by the rebels in the presence of her husband and\nbrothers who were made to stand close by with their hands tied behind. When\nthey shut their eyes in abhorrence, they were compelled at the point of a sword\nto open their eyes and witness the rape committed by the brute in their\npresence. I loathe even to write of such a mean action. This instance of rape\nwas communicated to me by one of her brothers confidentially. There are several\ninstances of such mean atrocities which are not revealed by people\u2026.\u2019<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Speech of Lord Reading,\nviceroy of India, on 20th of August 1921<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2018A few Europeans and\nmany Hindus have been murdered, communications have been obstructed. Hindu\ntemples sacked, houses of Europeans and Hindus burnt. According to reports\nHindus were forcibly converted to Islam\u2026 The result has been the temporary\ncollapse of the Civil Government and offices and courts have ceased to function\nand ordinary business has been brought to a standstill. European and Hindu\nrefugees of all classes are concentrated at Calicut and it is satisfactory to\nnote that they are safe there. One trembles to think of the consequences if the\nforces of order had not prevailed for the protection of Calicut. Those who are\nresponsible for causing this grave outbreak of violence and crime must be\nbrought to justice and made to suffer the punishment of the guilty.\u2019<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE KHILAFAT MOVEMENT\nHAD NOTHING TO DO WITH INDIA.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ROTHSCHILD\nGOT RID OF THE MUSLIM TURKEY SULTAN AND INSTALLED A DONMEH CRYPTO JEW MUSTAFA\nKEMAL ATATURK . .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SINCE THEN TURKEY HAS\nBEEN RULED BY CRYPTO JEWS , AND THIS INCLUDES THE CURRENT ERDOGAN . . .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EVER WONDERED WHY\nROTHSCHILD MEDIA AND OUR BENAMI MEDIA KEEP USING THE TERM \u201cYOUNG TURKS\u201d?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Telengana occupied 50% of\nthe state\u2019s area.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ruling elites, including the Nizam, were Muslims, while\nthe majority of the people were Hindus. &nbsp; Only communists peasants ( atheist who stopped going to temples ) and converted Muslims got the benefit of distributed lands.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Forty percent of the\nland was either directly owned by the Nizam or given by the Nizam to loyal\nelites in the form of jagirs (special tenures). The remaining sixty percent was\nunder the government\u2019s land revenue system, which relied on powerful landlords\n.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By the end of July\n1947, most of the landowners abandoned their homes escaped with their lives\nalong with officials of govt land registry offices . Even retired officials ran\nfor their lives.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If operation Polo has\nNOT started in time , most of the Hindus would have run away from Nizam\u2019s\nkingdom, such was the reign of terror.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aware that land have\nbeen grabbed and records burnt&nbsp; , Nehru\nissued the Jagir Abolition Regulation (August 1949) and set up an Agrarian\nEnquiry Committee to recommend comprehensive land reform legislation.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Within two weeks\nlandlords who ran away returned and&nbsp;\nregained their lost lands ( some holding original land deeds ) though\ntheir homes were burnt down.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">General J.N. Chaudhuri,\nthe military governor made a statement from Hyderabad, calling all \u201ccommunists\nto surrender within a week, failing which they would be exterminated\u201d , as\nrequired by Sardar Patel.&nbsp;&nbsp; This threat\nwas NOT an empty one , as thousands of murderous atheist commie were\nexterminated like cockroaches.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nehru had balls , along\nwith a 56 inch chest.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Godavari forest\nregion, the commie guerillas told Patel to go to hell . The military repression\nwas intense in this area. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This&nbsp; led to the recasting of the party approach to\nthe understanding of the character of the Indian state, the stage of\nrevolution, the path of revolution, and the nature of armed revolution <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">P. Sundarayya alluded\nto the abandonment of the 1951 tactical line of the necessity of combining the\nworkers\u2019 uprisings with the partisan warfare of the peasantry, of the need to\nestablish a powerful working class movement with underground factory and\nworkshop committees which represented the line of the party.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is how he\nunderlined the retreat from the 1951 Statement of Policy by the party:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2018\u2026We are all agreed\nthat our path is not exactly of Russia or China but will be our independent\npath, based on the working class peasant alliance, if possible simultaneously\nsynchronising of peasant armed revolts (leading to establishment of guerrilla\nbases and then to liberation bases) and general strikes and armed insurrections\nin the industrial and administrative centres. To make our revolution\nsuccessful, the necessity of combining these two main forces on All-India scale\nbecomes essential. But from this we slip unconsciously in the name of preparing\nfor working class and peasant movements on all-India scale to plan all-India\nmass actions, which taking our party\u2019s present organisational weakness, and the\nweakness of general democratic movements leads us more or less to\nconstitutional and \u2013 parliamentary forms of activity, neglecting other basic\ntasks of the party\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>BRRAAAAYYYYYYYYYYYYY !</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During Nizam\u2019s rule\nUrdu language created by Jew Rothschild&nbsp;\nwas made the language of the courts and the administration at all\nlevels, and also the medium of instruction from the primary stage.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only with\nthe special permission of the Nizam and his administrators could private\nschools for children, even at middle school level, in the mother tongues of the\npeople \u2013 Telugu, Kannada and Marathi \u2013 be started.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even language libraries and literary\nassociations could be started only with the permission of the authorities. No\nwonder, the literacy rate was only 5.8% cent. The Nizam of Hyderabad state, had\nonly 10% Muslims while Hindus were 90%&nbsp; .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Nizam and mullas tried to instil a feeling that the Muslims were the ruling\nclass and they had a right to lord it over the rest of the people of the state.\nThe truth is the cream of the Muslims in administrative posts were crypto Jew\nMuslims.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of the aspects of this Muslim feudal rule was reflected in the\nlanguage policy of the state, making Urdu dominate, at the cost of major\nlanguages, which were the mother-tongues of the overwhelming majority of the\npeople of the state.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In November 1989,\nnational parliamentary and state assembly elections were held in India and\nAndhra Pradesh and M. Chenna Reddy of the Congress (I) became chief minister of\nAndhra Pradesh.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Under pressure from\nforeign funded NGOs and International human rights groups , he released hundred\nof murderous naxalites . These releases hardcore criminals started organizing\nrallies with foreign sponsorship.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pretty soon Naxalite\ngroups began to operate more openly, appropriating forest and private land and\nestablishing summary praja (\"people's\") courts to resolve local\ndisputes and dispense justice. At the same time, killings by the groups also\ncontinued, and by the end of the year, more than 230 murders were attributed to\nthe PWG ( People\u2019s war group )&nbsp; and other\nNaxalite groups.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The PWG also organized series of strikes though the year,\nincluding one on June 20, 1990, which nearly paralyzed the entire state. Chief\nMinister Chenna Reddy came under increased pressure from Congress (I) land\nowners whose lands were grabbed by Naxalite groups.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By late June 1990, the\nthaw was over and the government had launched a new offensive against the Naxalites\n. &nbsp;In January 1991, a dissident faction\nof the Congress (I) in Andhra Pradesh succeeded in ousting Chenna Reddy's\ngovernment. Congress (I) chief minister Janardhan Reddy replaced Chenna Reddy\nand, almost immediately upon taking office, publicly vowed to crush the Naxalite\ngroups. At his request, the paramilitary forces of the Central Reserve Police\nwere deployed in a number of districts to supplement the regular state police.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;In late 1991, the state government again\npublicly announced a campaign to crush all Naxalite groups. The statement was\nfollowed on December 6 1991 by the assassination of a former Congress (I)\nmember of the legislative assembly and former minister, T. Hayagrivachary, for\nwhich the PWG claimed responsibility. The offensive against Naxalites\ncontinued, and on May 21, 1992, the PWG was banned.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The largest and most powerful\nof the Naxalite groups is the Peoples War Group (PWG). The other two major\nNaxalite groups active in Andhra Pradesh are the CPI (M-L) (C.P. Reddy group)\nand the CPI (M-L) (Praja Pandha group).&nbsp; All\nwere armed with Chinese make AK-47S.</span> &nbsp;&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Naxalite groups did not\ntechnically control territory, but command considerable influence in a number of\ndistricts where they have forcibly redistributed land to poor peasants and\ntribals. &nbsp;In some villages, particularly\nin the forested tribal areas, they operated a parallel government, running\npraja courts and other village organizations.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The naxalites ,\nespecially the PWG,&nbsp; detonated bombs and\nset fires in government buildings, trains, bus depots and other public\nfacilities. They causes several train derailments by sabotage<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In October 1990, a railway\ncompartment was set on fire on a train traveling from Hyderabad to Warangal.\nForty-five passengers burned to death in the blaze. The guerrillas who set the\nfire openly shouted PWG naxal slogans. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The naxals created \"praja courts\" in\nthe villages to settle disputes and dispense summary justice. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Persons transgressing\nthe ruling of the praja court were punished by beatings, amputations of the\nhand or foot, or executions. &nbsp;Villagers\nwere required to provide the guerrillas with food and money, under duress.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The PWG and other\ngroups have also attempted to enforce election boycotts by killing candidates\nand threatening voters. On May 7, 1991, S. Chenna Reddy, a Congress (I) member\nof the Andhra Pradesh legislative assembly, was shot dead in his home in\nPenugonda. The People's War Group&nbsp;\nclaimed responsibility for the assassination. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The PWG had called for\na boycott of the polls, and threatened to kill candidates for election. At the time\nof S. Chenny Reddy's killing, two other Congress (I) candidates had already\nbeen killed.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">On January 17, 1992,\nthe PWG detonated a bomb at the Devarauppala police station.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Several times Dalits\nwere massacred by Naxals by way of false flag attacks &nbsp;and the blame put on police by Foreign funded\nNGOs and International human rights groups.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Kamma NTR ruled\nAndhra his own caste&nbsp; enjoyed a disproportionately\nhigh number of cabinet positions in the government . A lot of them were ex- beneficiaries of commie land grabbing.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;In the early morning hours of December 6, T.\nHayagrivachari, a former Congress (I) minister in the state government and\nformer member of the legislative assembly (MLA), was assassinated at his home\nin Hanamkonda. The PWG took responsibility for the killing, by a&nbsp; press note.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most PWG meets used to\ntake place in safe student hostels in colleges ( just like what happens in JNU\n)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TADA was enacted in\nIndia in 1985 under the government of then Prime Minister Rajiv Gandhi which\nargued that&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">the security forces in\nPunjab required greater powers.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">Khalistanis had provided arms to Telugu Naxals of the PWG.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since then, the act has been used throughout\nIndia.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The People\u2019s War Group\nwas formed in Southern Indian State of Andhra Pradesh on April 22, 1980 by\nKondapalli Seetharamaiah, one of the most influential Naxalite leaders in the\nState and a member of the erstwhile Central Organising Committee of the\nCommunist Party of India\u2013\u2013Marxist-Leninist, (CPI-ML)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The party was banned in\nAndhra Pradesh in May 1992, under the Criminal Law (Amendment) Act. In February\n1992 the national Home Ministry requested the states of Maharashtra, Madhya\nPradesh and Orissa to ban the party. The party remained unbanned at the\nnational level, though.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In December 2004\nCPI(ML)PW and all its front organisations were banned as a 'terrorist\norganisation' under the Unlawful Activities (Prevention) Amendment Act, 2004<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The PWG traces its\nideology to the Chinese leader Mao Tse Tung\u2019s theory of organised peasant\ninsurrection. It rejects parliamentary democracy and believes in capturing\npolitical power through protracted armed struggle based on guerrilla warfare.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This strategy entails building up of bases in rural and remote areas and\ntransforming them first into guerrilla zones and then as liberated zones,\nbesides the area-wise seizure and encircling cities. The eventual objective is\nto install a \"people\u2019s government\" through the \"people\u2019s\nwar\". In short, as the PWG claims, it wishes to usher in a New Democratic\nrevolution (NDR).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">P Vara Vara Rao is a\ntop leader of PWG and is projected as the PWG\u2019s principal \u2018ideologue\u2019<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Foreign funded and\nsponsored Naxalite Varavara Rao has addressed thousands of public gathering of\nNaxals and Maoist. He has the support of Jew Noam Chomsky and the collegium\njudges</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Varavara Rao's seditious\npolitical and literary activity enraged the government of Andhra Pradesh to\narrest him under the Maintenance of Internal Security Act (MISA) in October\n1973. The High Court of Andhra Pradesh struck down the order and released him\nafter a month and a half. &nbsp;The High Court\njudgment asked the government not to resort to such actions against writers\nunless their writings have an immediate and direct bearing in a physical action.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During Emergency, Indira\nGandhi detained <span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Varavara Rao</span> &nbsp;under the\nMISA.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Below: The face of a Naxalite thinker ! &nbsp;He writes bullshit poetry and hence is a protected penquin. He is part of the RWA ( revolutionary writer's association -sic--people who call for India's barbaadi )</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-XBeDIs52pDo/V8ntfj216eI/AAAAAAABLd0/Q6snclQ4D5wMb_lByTf-SL_o3z74aZwrACLcB/s1600/11hymrl01-RDF_sG_HY_1235147e.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-XBeDIs52pDo/V8ntfj216eI/AAAAAAABLd0/Q6snclQ4D5wMb_lByTf-SL_o3z74aZwrACLcB/s640/11hymrl01-RDF_sG_HY_1235147e.jpg\" width=\"530\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was one of the few prisoners whose interviews with their relatives\nwere restricted and their mail was subjected to stringent scrutiny.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">hough\nall the prisoners were released on the day when Emergency was lifted, Varavara\nRao was arrested again at the entrance of the jail and was kept behind the bars\nfor a week more on a fresh MISA warrant. He was released only when the new\nJanata Party government repealed the Act itself under Kosher influence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>FOREIGN SPONSORED &nbsp;NAXAL THINKERS ARE THOUSAND OF TIMES MORE\nDANGEROUS THAN THE ILLITERATE GUINEA PIG CADRE.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The PWG has spread its\ntentacles all over India . &nbsp;&nbsp;In any\ngeneral strike the PWG ideologues and JNU/ DU/ JU commie professors are\ninvolved.&nbsp; They have the support of the\nBenami main stream media .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PWG also has a string\nof front organisations of students, youth, industrial workers, miners, farm\nhands, women, poets, writers and cultural artists. line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>Naxals received training from\nLTTE in gun handling &nbsp;and bomb making.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On July 1, 2001, nine\nleft wing extremist outfits active in India, Nepal, Sri Lanka and Bangladesh\nformed an umbrella organisation, the Coordination Committes of Maoist Parties\nand Orgainsations (CCOMPOSA) with a purpose to unify and coordinate the\nactivities of the Maoist parties and organisations in South Asia. The CCOMPOSA\ncomprises<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
