BEFORE THEY WERE PENNED DOWN 70 CENTURIES AGO . .<br />\n<br />\nHUMAN DNA WAS DEGRADING AND SUCH MEMORY FEATS WERE GETTING HARD TO COME BY . .<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/untouchables-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE BOTTOM THREE VARNAS HAD TO BE CONTENT WITH PURANAS-- OUR GODS WERE PERSONALISED FOR EASY CONSUMPTION AND RETENTION , AMONG THE ILLITERATE AND NOT SO BRIGHT . .<br />\n<br />\nFOR EXAMPLE: OPERATON DESERT STORM , WAS NOT FOUGHT IN A DESERT STORM. IT IS JUST AN EASY WAY TO REMEMBER . .<br />\n<br />\nSO THERE IS NO FUCKIN' WAY--<br />\n<br />\n######## BRAHMA CAN SCREW HIS OWN DAUGHTER<br />\n<br />\n####### SHIVA CAN FUCK THE WIVES OF THE SAPT RISHIS ( GREAT DIPPER STARS ) WHO WERE IN DEEP PENANCE<br />\n<br />\n#### SHIVA CAN EAT CORPSES OR RAPE NANDI BULL ANALLY<br />\n<br />\n##### VISHNU CAN SCREW SHIVAs WIFE BEHIND HIS BACK<br />\n<br />\n###### SHIVA AND VISHNU CAN HAVE HOMOSEXUAL ANAL SEX AND PRODUCE LORD AYYAPPA ( NINTH AVATAR OF VISHNU )<br />\n<br />\nDROHI -- ROGUE SRI SRI RAVISHAKAR HAS THE FOLLOWING TO SAY ABOUT SHIVA AND VISHNU PRODUCING A CHILD BY GAY SEX . .<br />\n<br />\nAND THIS SHAKTI MAGIC OIL PEDDLING DROHI ( WITH A DYED BEARD AND GARGANTUAN PAUNCH ) CLAIMS TO REPRESENT SANATANA DHARMA AS PER ROTHSCHILDs MEDIA . .<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://twitter.com/srisri/status/410810667176697856?lang=en</span><br />\n<br />\nVISHNU AVATARS LIKE RAM, KRISHNA , AYYAPPA WERE MORTALS WHO LIVES ON EARTH WITH 13 STRAND DNA ( NIL JUNK ) AND MORE.<br />\n<br />\nBRAHMAN , THE MOTHER FIELD , SHEARED OFF PARTS OF ITSELF , AND SEND THEM ON EARTH <b><span style=\"color: red;\">WITHOUT REDUCING </span></b>THE SOUL FREQUENCY .<br />\n<br />\nYOU AND ME WERE SENT DOWN ON EARTH <b><span style=\"color: red;\">AFTER REDUCING</span></b> SOUL FREQUENCY AND WE ( SOULS ) HAD TO EVOLVE THROUGH EVERY SINGLE LIFE FORM , TILL WE GOT MOKSHA ( SOULS BY NOW HAVE HIGHEST FREQUENCY ) AND MERGED BACK WITH THE MOTHER BRAHMAN FIELD ON THE 7TH ASTRAL LAYER<br />\n<br />\nONLY VISHNU CAN HAVE AVATARS .<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS BECAUSE VISHNU CONTROLS THE SECOND TEMPLATE OF DVAITA<br />\n<br />\nVISHNU MEDIATES THE DANCE OF OPPOSITE FORCES ( SHIVA/ BRAHMA -- SAY CONDENSATION/ EVAPORATION )<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nJUST IN CASE SHIVA FOLLOWERS GET UPSET THAT VISHNU FOLLOWERS HAVE STOLEN A MARCH OVER THEM - -<br />\n<br />\nCONSIDER THIS--<br />\n<br />\nTHE THIRD TEMPLATE ( SUPER IMPOSED ON BASE BRAHMAN ) OF SANKHYA CONSISTS OF SHIVA AND HIS WIFE SHAKTI ( PARVATI/ DURGA/ KALI )<br />\n<br />\nYOU CANNOT HAVE SHIVA WITHOUT VISHNU AND BRAHMA<br />\n<br />\nYOU CANNOT HAVE SHIVA WITHOUT HIS WIFE PARVATI . . THIS CONCEPT CALLED ADHANEESHWARA DOES NOT MEAN THAT SHIVA IS A TRANGENDER HIJRA AS TOM TOMMED BY BR AMBADKAR, EVR PERIYAR, MAHATMA PHULE, UR ANATHAMURTHY, &nbsp;KALBURGI, &nbsp;PANSARE , DHABHOLKAR etc<br />\n<br />\nNEPAL WAS A HINDU NATION . .<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD COMMIES CONVERTED NEPAL INTO A COMMIE NATION AND GOT THE ROYALTY ELIMINATED<br />\n<br />\nHOW DID COMMUNISM RISE SO FAST IN NEPAL?<br />\n<br />\nTHEY MADE THE HINDUS SELF LOATHING AND MADE THEM ATHEISTS.<br />\n<br />\nTHE ANNUAL GADHIMAI ANIMAL SACRIFICE MASSACRE WAS PART OF THIS BRAINWASH.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS BLOGSITE CLAIMS CREDIT FOR STOPPING THIS ANNUAL HORRIBLE ANIMAL MASSACRE . .<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/11/all-animal-sacrifices-in-hindu-temples.html</span><br />\n<br />\nJNU COMMIE PROFESSORS CREATED A COMMIE NEPAL PRIME MINISTER NAMED BABURAM BHATTARAI- WHO WAS INVOLVED IN THE WESTERN SPONSORED NEPAL ROYAL MASSACRE<br />\n<br />\nAND WHAT DOES OUR APCO MODI DO?<br />\n<br />\nHE GOES TO ASSAM AND PROPS UP THE HUMAN/ ANIMAL SACRIFICING KAMAKHYA TEMPLE ( ROTHSCHILDs CREATION ) --JUST TO MILK VOTES. .<br />\n<br />\nhttp://www.narendramodi.in/pm-modi-offers-prayers-at-kamakhya-temple-in-assam-440177<br />\n<br />\nWHEN DID MODI LAST SUPPORT A CAUSE FOR HINDUS? Radicals, including Pierre-Joseph Proudhon (1809-65) and the Chartist movement in England, had long used language that modern-day readers would identify as \u201cMarxist\u201d\u2014\u201cto enjoy political equality, abolish property\u201d; \u201creserve army of labour\u201d and so forth.<br />\n<br />\nWhat, then, was his contribution?<br />\n<br />\nMuch of his time was spent disagreeing with other radicals, attacking Proudhon in particular, whom he likened to one of the \u201cbourgeois economists\u201d. Far more significantly, he attempted to provide an overall theoretical description of how capitalism worked, especially in Das Kapital, which was published in 1867.<br />\n<br />\nMarx's Das Kapital, fails to mention that money is printed out of thin air and keeps the name of his cousins, the Rothschilds, out of it, despite the fact that they were the richest and most powerful capitalist family in the whole world\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nRothschild hired Marx to draft a social doctrine to invert moral order for centralizing their nation state\u2019s wealth Into Rothschild controlled coffers... In Marx\u2019s pamphlets, mudslinging abounds: Marx's heavy-handed insults tend to make us doubt Marx himself, since he relies so much on vituperation instead of reasoned argument.<br />\n<br />\nMarx's conclusion that aggregate price and profit are determined by\u2014and equal to\u2014aggregate value and surplus value is bullshit. There goes his his theory that the exploitation of workers is the sole source of profit.<br />\n<br />\nMarx's essential idea, was that capitalism would become less and less profitable and that its downward spiral toward the abyss of deflation\u2014lower prices, lower profits\u2014would be followed by worldwide revolution.<br />\n<br />\nThe laws of dialectics at the very base of Marxism are fundamentally flawed-- some are \"truisms with no specific Marxist content\", others \"philosophical dogmas that cannot be proved by scientific means\", yet others just bullshit. EVER WRITTEN</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn the Nature and Causes of the Wealth of Nations, Jew Rothschild\u2019s agent Adam Smith proposed that the free market, where producers are free to produce as much as they want and charge consumers the prices they want, would result in the most efficient and desirable economic outcome for consumers and producers alike due to the \u201cInvisible Hand.\u201d</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe rationale for his proposal was that each individual would try to maximize his own benefit. In doing so, consumers would only pay as much as or less than they would value the benefit derived from a good, and producers would only sell for as much as or higher than they would have spent on producing a good.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn his idealistic economy, there would be no surplus or deficit supply or demand; markets would always be in equilibrium, and the benefits to consumers and producers alike would be maximized. There would be a limited role for the government in such an economic system.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn contrast, Karl Marx in his Das Kapital reasoned that workers would be exploited by any capitalist, or factory owners, for the capitalist system provides an inherent advantage to the already rich and a disadvantage to the already poor segments of society. The rich would get richer and the poor would get poorer. Furthermore, the \u201ccapitalist\u201d is always in a better position to negotiate a low wage for his workers, he argued.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nOne of his notable and more contentious theories \u2013 the labor theory of value \u2013 claims that the value of a good or service is directly connected to the amount of labor required for its production. Interestingly, Karl Marx also had his own drastic, political ideas that were far away from those of Adam Smith\u2019s.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Adam Smith? He never married, and he used to walk like a CHAKKA\u2014as he was an anal sex receiving gay . Another time our man Adam Smith without as much as a \u201cby your leave\u201d went out sleep walking in his nightgown in broad daylight and ended up 24 km outside of town, before nearby church bells brought him back to reality.<br />\n<br />\nAdam Smith had OCD or obsessive compulsive disorder-just like Karl Marx..<br />\n<br />\nHis house used to look like a garbage dump as he hoarded everything.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/are-you-mentally-sick-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nMuch later in 1799, R0thschild would murder Tipu Sultan , and then make a huge pretense of a great war. By now Adam Smith was dead and gone. But the blue print was his alone.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/tipu-sultan-unmasked-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWhen such MAD people write the gospel of economics, \" The Weath Of Nations\" you know what you will get. Much later Milton Friedman effectively took many of the basic principles set forth by Adam Smith and the classical economists and modernized them. This is the reason why economists fall into the same hole again and again and again.<br />\n<br />\nI am a perceptive ship Captain. I really don't care for mother hen's opinion as to how good the omelette on my breakfast plate is.<br />\n<br />\nNow let me digress and give you an brief introduction to the great American Depression of 1924. This is one of the holes I talked about before when all economists fell face down .<br />\n<br />\nAdam Smith (1776) defined what was then called political economy as \"an inquiry into the nature and causes of the wealth of nations\".<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/murky-truths-of-inflation-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThe international bankers mentored by Rothschild installed a Central Bank in 1913\u2026The Federal Reserve. And as long as this institution exists, perpetual debt is guaranteed.<br />\n<br />\nUnfortunately, economics is often viewed with confusion and boredom. Endless streams of financial jargon coupled with intimidating empirical mathematics quickly baffle and deter people from attempts at understanding it.<br />\n<br />\nHowever, the fact is, the complexity associated with the financial system is a mere mask, designed to conceal one of the most socially paralyzing structures humanity has ever endured.<br />\n<br />\nEvery single dollar in your wallet is owed to somebody by somebody; for remember, the only way the money can come into existence is from loans. Therefore, if everyone in the country were able to pay off all debts, including the government, there would not be one dollar in circulation. If there were no debts in Adam Smith modeled US money system, there wouldn`t be any money.<br />\n<br />\n\u201cFamine has never risen from any other cause but the violence of government attempting by improper means, to remedy the inconvenience of dearth.\u201d \u2013 Adam Smith<br />\n<br />\nAdam Smith talks above, about the Bengal famine, he initiated which killed 10.2 million Bengalis ( 102 lakh )<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TOO 4-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_2MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_2BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_2B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_3B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6316195402887733477\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_3M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">Capt. These slogans were provided by John Dewey.<br /><br />The next day, students in Beijing as a whole went on strike and in the larger cities across China, students, patriotic merchants, and workers joined protests.<br /><br />Rothschild\u2019s agent John Dewey got all Rothschild controlled newspapers to relay the People\u2019s march across the country.<br /><br />John Dewey organized mass strikes in Shanghai, a general strike of merchants and workers nearly devastated the entire Chinese economy.<br /><br />John Dewey leading from behind , founded the 1921 Communist Party of China, in 1921<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/08/chinese-revolution-biggest-genocide-on.html</span><br /><br />CONTINUED TO 2-<br /><span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_167MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_167BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_167B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_168B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c9202872898797639953\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_168M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. When I went to jail in 1968, no one here cut trees, there was no smuggling. When I came back from jail 10 years later, on the bus to Naxalbari, I was about to give up my seat to a lady who looked clearly pregnant, and my companion said, don't be a fool, Kanuda, she's just a smuggler, carrying stuff underneath her saree. <span style=\"color: blue;\">Yes, we grabbed land and did land distribution. But is the land with the peasants? Anyway, what can a poor peasant do with a small piece of land? He gets armtwisted to do a distress sale and becomes a sharecropper again, it's just that the name of the jotedar is different from the one in 1967. After 9/11 and the (Indian) parliament attack,\nMuslims were targeted once again\u2026 Our party is willing to unite in a broad\nfront with all the genuine democratic forces which would be willing to fight\nback the Hindu fascist offensive.\u201d</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Maoists have\nattempted &nbsp;to win over the support of the\nMuslim community and thus broaden their base. &nbsp;&nbsp;The Maoists are making common cause with SIMI\nby condemning its proscription as they too are a proscribed organisation in\nsome states; they are also banned by the central government under the Unlawful\nActivities Prevention Act.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The brains of Indians Maoists\n/ Naxals in the form of Commie professors of JNU,&nbsp; JU&nbsp; and\nDU &nbsp;have adopted the slimy tactic of\nmaking common cause with any organisation or body that opposes the Indian state\neither through peaceful means or violently. According to the CPI-Maoist, they would\nform two types of fronts: Strategic United Front (SUF) and Tactical United\nFront (TUF).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The RDF was the prime\nmover behind the formation of the People\u2019s Democratic Front of India (PDFI)\nthat was founded in July 2006. &nbsp;Its members include Medha Patkar, Nandita\nHaksar, S.A.R. Geelani, B.D. Sharma, P. The couple moved to Siliguri, which was the centre of Majumdar's\nactivities for a few years. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During the mid 1960s\nMao controlled Charu Majumdar organized a leftist faction in Communist Party of\nIndia (Marxist) (CPI(M)) in northern Bengal. Sanyal became the leader of COI(ML).</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 23 Mar 2010, he was\nfound hanging at his residence at Seftullajote village, 25 km Siliguri (West\nBengal) from where Naxal Movement began under his leadership.. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the time of his\ndeath he was the general secretary of a new CPI(ML), formed by merger of\nseveral splinter groups of the original party.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JNU professors\nbrainwash their students .&nbsp; \u201cThe powerful\nbourgeois have always propagated myths to keep the proletariat divided. Lin became instrumental in creating the foundations for Mao Zedong's cult of personality in the early 1960s, and was rewarded for his service in the Cultural Revolution by being named Mao's designated successor. Lin worked closely with Mao, promoting Mao's cult of personality. Lin directed the compilation of some of Chairman Mao's writings into a handbook, the Quotations from Chairman Mao Zedong, which became known as the Little Red Book. Following Lin's death ( his plane was shot down ) , he was officially condemned as a traitor by the Communist Party. Since the late 1970s Lin and Mao's wife Jiang Qing (with her Gang of Four) have been labeled the two major \"counter-revolutionary forces\" of the Cultural Revolution, receiving official blame from the Chinese government. For several decades, Lin's name and image were censored within China for plotting a coup against Mao. Only in 2007, a portrait of Lin was added to the Chinese Military Museum in Beijing, included in a display of the \"Ten Marshals\", a group considered to be the founders of China's armed forces.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Today when Naxalites kill innocent people ( by derailing trains etc ) there is NO\nhuman rights abuse. &nbsp; &nbsp;Rather the JNU commie professors and students have a party . . &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; Police and judiciary keep away.<br />\n<br />\nThese POLITICAL GOONDA workers barge into your house while loading/ unloading and even your privacy is compromised for they look everywhere . They stare at your wives and daughters .<br />\n<br />\nThe Kerala Loading and Unloading (Regulation of Wages and Restriction of Unlawful Practices) Act, 2002, states that attimari rates are to be regulated by the government and that nokkukooli is unlawful .<br />\nBut successive governments have done nothing to enforce the law and end the practice. For these are goondas used by MP and MLA to settle scores and break legs and knee caps .<br />\n<br />\nThe unions of the ROTHSCHILD CONTROLLED Left parties ( YES\u2014EVEN NOW ) were most forceful in extracting attimari and nokkukooli.<br />\n<br />\nSenior CPM leaders spake - Eradicating nokkukooli is fine, but we will not allow that to become a pretext for exploiting workers .<br />\n<br />\nNow with mobile phone system they lurk in the shadows and ambush you even if you shift house at midnight .<br />\n<br />\nThe attimari people set up camp near supermarkets to extort. If they are NOT happy with the payment you can kiss the glass panes goodbye .<br />\n<br />\nDOES NARENDRA MODI / PINARAYI VIJAYAN HAVE THE POLITICAL WILL ?<br />\n<br />\nOr should people lose hope ?<br />\n<br />\nAre we a democracy ?<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nReplyDelete<br />\nReplies<br />\n<br />\nCapt. IT IS PENNED BY A DELUSIONAL BELOW AVERAGE BRAIN</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\nBUT FOR ROTHSCHILDs SPONSORSHIP-THIS BOOK WOULD HAVE BEEN DISCARDED IN THE GARBAGE BIN OF HISTORY</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\nEVEN GEORG HEGEL WAS NOT SO DELUSIONAL..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\nBOTH MARX ( 18 ) AND HEGEL ( 8 ) ARE IN THE VADAKAYIL GARBAGE BIN..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\nLET MINDLESS CUNTS LIKE KANHAIYA KUMAR AND HIS COMMIE MENTORS HANG ON TO THE MARX LANGOT..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\nFrom Das Kapital sprung the economic and political systems that at one time dominated half the earth and for nearly a century kept the world on the brink of war and mindless violent revolutions</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; Marx clung so dearly to Hegel that he ended up espousing a sort of \u201cCalvinism without God,\u201d turning Marxism into a quasi-religious ideology..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\nHis Hegelian ideology led him to espouse a most unscientific socialism. Marx called his theory \u201cscientific socialism,\u201d not because he followed the scientific method, but merely because it was dialectical and materialist.&nbsp;</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\nDialectics is not scientific as much as practical. Radicals, including Pierre-Joseph Proudhon (1809-65) and the Chartist movement in England, had long used language that modern-day readers would identify as \u201cMarxist\u201d\u2014\u201cto enjoy political equality, abolish property\u201d; \u201creserve army of labour\u201d and so forth.<br />\n<br />\nWhat, then, was his contribution?<br />\n<br />\nMuch of his time was spent disagreeing with other radicals, attacking Proudhon in particular, whom he likened to one of the \u201cbourgeois economists\u201d. Far more significantly, he attempted to provide an overall theoretical description of how capitalism worked, especially in Das Kapital, which was published in 1867.<br />\n<br />\nMarx's Das Kapital, fails to mention that money is printed out of thin air and keeps the name of his cousins, the Rothschilds, out of it, despite the fact that they were the richest and most powerful capitalist family in the whole world\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nRothschild hired Marx to draft a social doctrine to invert moral order for centralizing their nation state\u2019s wealth Into Rothschild controlled coffers... Marx saw free trade as positive because it undermines established nations and cultures.<br />\n<br />\nMillions of people are still under the misapprehension that Marxism / Communism is against profiteering dishonest banks and multi national companies.. The Rothschild banking family - the richest and most powerful banksters, for the past 200 years - financed Karl Marx's pretense of an attack on the profiteering dishonest.banksters, in order to fool the masses, and it worked. ..<br />\n<br />\nMarx's hidden message was: \u201cForget your individual rights and privileges and trust in the State and the Trade Unions, and they'll do your thinking for you.\u201d ..Millions of people believed that nonsense, and subsequently allowed 'others' to do their thinking for them.<br />\n<br />\nThe trade unions and the governments are ALL working for the Rothschild's - who own the banks, including Bank of England, US Federal Reserve,and all the big multi national companies, dangle politicians like rag dolls and hold all of the people as tax-debt slaves, through their corrupt central banks and their funny money.<br />\n<br />\nMarx's writing style was a calamity: full of sometimes puerile vehemence, Marx heaped scorn on his opponents, inaugurating the long Marxist tradition of mercilessly deriding anyone with incorrect opinions. In Marx\u2019s pamphlets, mudslinging abounds: Marx's heavy-handed insults tend to make us doubt Marx himself, since he relies so much on vituperation instead of reasoned argument.<br />\n<br />\nMarx's conclusion that aggregate price and profit are determined by\u2014and equal to\u2014aggregate value and surplus value is bullshit. There goes his his theory that the exploitation of workers is the sole source of profit.<br />\n<br />\nMarx's essential idea, was that capitalism would become less and less profitable and that its downward spiral toward the abyss of deflation\u2014lower prices, lower profits\u2014would be followed by worldwide revolution.<br />\n<br />\nThe laws of dialectics at the very base of Marxism are fundamentally flawed-- some are \"truisms with no specific Marxist content\", others \"philosophical dogmas that cannot be proved by scientific means\", yet others just bullshit. Some Marxist \"laws\" are vague and can be interpreted differently, but these interpretations generally fall into one of the aforementioned categories of flaws as well.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_4BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; He finished the first. But when it came to writing the second, on realizing that he would face insurmountable intellectual hurdles ( including being charged of mindless plagiarism ) , he pleaded illness.. when in reality he was fit as a fiddle and going around doing everything else.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWhat Marx accomplished was to produce such a comprehensive, dramatic, and fascinating vision that it could withstand innumerable empirical contradictions, logical refutations, and moral revulsions at its effects.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe Marxian vision took the overwhelming complexity of the real world and made the parts fall into place, in a way that was intellectually exhilarating and conferred such a sense of moral superiority that opponents could be simply labelled and dismissed as moral lepers or blind reactionaries.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMarxism was \u2013 and remains \u2013 a mighty instrument for the acquisition and maintenance of political power.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nKarl Marx's value theory and law of the tendency of the rate of profit to fall are a crock of shit.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMarx does not even understand socialism. EVER WRITTEN</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn the Nature and Causes of the Wealth of Nations, Jew Rothschild\u2019s agent Adam Smith proposed that the free market, where producers are free to produce as much as they want and charge consumers the prices they want, would result in the most efficient and desirable economic outcome for consumers and producers alike due to the \u201cInvisible Hand.\u201d</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe rationale for his proposal was that each individual would try to maximize his own benefit. In doing so, consumers would only pay as much as or less than they would value the benefit derived from a good, and producers would only sell for as much as or higher than they would have spent on producing a good.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn his idealistic economy, there would be no surplus or deficit supply or demand; markets would always be in equilibrium, and the benefits to consumers and producers alike would be maximized. There would be a limited role for the government in such an economic system.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn contrast, Karl Marx in his Das Kapital reasoned that workers would be exploited by any capitalist, or factory owners, for the capitalist system provides an inherent advantage to the already rich and a disadvantage to the already poor segments of society. The rich would get richer and the poor would get poorer. Furthermore, the \u201ccapitalist\u201d is always in a better position to negotiate a low wage for his workers, he argued.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nOne of his notable and more contentious theories \u2013 the labor theory of value \u2013 claims that the value of a good or service is directly connected to the amount of labor required for its production. Interestingly, Karl Marx also had his own drastic, political ideas that were far away from those of Adam Smith\u2019s.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: small;\">Adam Smith? There was supposed to be a great heroic Battle of Plassey in 1757, for the British East India Company under Robert Clive to take over India. The excuse was the incident called the Black hole of Calcutta.<br />\n<br />\nAdam Smith ( born 5 June 1723 \u2013 died 17 July 1790) took ten years to write his economics gospel by way of a book \u201cThe Wealth of Nations \u201c , publishing it in 1776. . He never married, and he used to walk like a CHAKKA\u2014as he was an anal sex receiving gay . He was delusional too, sometimes in a morbid manner.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/back-swing-of-john-galt-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nHe is also said to have put bread and butter into a teapot, drunk the concoction, upped his ante and made a hue and cry over the quality of tea . Another time our man Adam Smith without as much as a \u201cby your leave\u201d went out sleep walking in his nightgown in broad daylight and ended up 24 km outside of town, before nearby church bells brought him back to reality.<br />\n<br />\nAdam Smith had OCD or obsessive compulsive disorder-just like Karl Marx..<br />\n<br />\nHis house used to look like a garbage dump as he hoarded everything.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/are-you-mentally-sick-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nMuch later in 1799, R0thschild would murder Tipu Sultan , and then make a huge pretense of a great war. By now Adam Smith was dead and gone. But the blue print was his alone.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/tipu-sultan-unmasked-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWhen such MAD people write the gospel of economics, \" The Weath Of Nations\" you know what you will get. Much later Milton Friedman effectively took many of the basic principles set forth by Adam Smith and the classical economists and modernized them. Therefore, if everyone in the country were able to pay off all debts, including the government, there would not be one dollar in circulation. If there were no debts in Adam Smith modeled US money system, there wouldn`t be any money.<br />\n<br />\n\u201cFamine has never risen from any other cause but the violence of government attempting by improper means, to remedy the inconvenience of dearth.\u201d \u2013 Adam Smith<br />\n<br />\nAdam Smith talks above, about the Bengal famine, he initiated which killed 10.2 million Bengalis ( 102 lakh )<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TOO 4-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_2MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_2BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_2B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_3B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6316195402887733477\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_3M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. THEY EXTRACTED THE GIST BUT THEN USED IT IN A MANNER IT WAS NOT MEANT TO BE USED..<br />\n<br />\nSCENARIO ONE: YOU DIP YOUR FINGER INTO A JAR OF HONEY AND PUT IT INTO THE MOUTH OF A SMALL BABY--AND THE BABY CLAPS IN GLEE .<br />\n<br />\nSCENARIO TWO: YOU DIP YOUR SYPHILITIC PRICK INTO A JAR OF HONEY AND PUT IT INTO THE MOUTH OF A SMALL BABY -- AND THE BABY CLAPS IN GLEE.<br />\n<br />\nRESULTS ARE THE SAME-- BUT ONE METHOD IS IMMORAL..<br />\n<br />\nALL THESE WESTERN PHILOSOPHERS WERE IMMORAL BASTARDS-- OUR VEDIC MAHARISHIS WERE MORAL AND HONORABLE..<br />\n<br />\nDEWEY HAS STOLEN FROM JEAN JACQUES ROUSSEAU , WHO IN TURN STOLE FROM PLATO..<br />\n<br />\nPLATO STOLE FROM KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY ( HE WAS A STUDENT THERE ) , OWNED BY THE CALICUT KING<br />\n<br />\nUSING CORRUPTED PHILOSOPHY JEAN BABY ( JACOBIN CLUB-- Soci\u00e9t\u00e9 des Jacobins, amis de la libert\u00e9 et de l'\u00e9galit\u00e9 ) CONDUCTED THE FRENCH REVOLUTION ..<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE SEEN HOW COMMIE JNU PROFESSORS AND COMRADE STUDENTS RAN AROUND JNU CAMPUS SHOUTING \"LAAL SALAAM\" AND \"LIBERTY EQUALITY FRATERNITY \" DURING THE KANHAIYA KUMAR EPISODE -- ROTHSCHILD COINED CALL<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/11/the-french-revolution-conceived-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nJOHN DEWEY WAS THE FATHER OF THE CHINESE REVOLUTION<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/08/chinese-revolution-biggest-genocide-on.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWHEN I SEE BRAINWASHED COMMIES LIKE SITARAM YECHURY, DANIEL RAJA, BRINDA KARAT ETC ON TV MOUTHING NONSENSE -- I PUKE MENTALLY ..<br />\n<br />\nJohn Dewer obfuscated , replacing simple words with bombastic words --to sound like a intellectual.. These traitor foreign funded commie professors give more marks to students who agitate and vandalise\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In the cities, the front \u201cmass organisations\u201d are generally manned by ideologues, who include academicians and activists, fully committed to the party line\u2026 Such organisations ostensibly pursue human rights-related issues and are adept at using the legal processes of the Indian state to undermine and emasculate enforcement action by the security forces.. \u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">We see the same faces in all CANDLE LIGHT VIGILS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">They malign state institutions through propaganda and disinformation to further the cause of their \u201crevolution\u201d.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">From these mass organisations, AGGRESSIVE individuals are selected, brainwashed for supporting and becoming members of the Maoist party. They get foreign funds ..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Has anybody ever found out who foots the travel / hotel bills of Umar Khaid , Snehla Rashid and Umar Khalid ?</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 3--</span><br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_6MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_6BR\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_6B_box\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_7B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c9050446933952586098\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_7M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_8.html?showComment=1528456639658#c9050446933952586098\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 8, 2018 at 4:47 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_7MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--<br />\n<br />\nOne important reason for the Maoists\u2019 focus on urban areas in the last few years is the recruitment ebb they are facing in tribal areas as tribals began to understand the hollowness of Maoist ideology.<br />\n<br />\nThe Maoist movement wants nothing short of a break-up of the Indian state. Its most insidious and dangerous arm is urban Naxalism.<br />\n<br />\nThe GURU of Fourth Generation Warfare, William Lind observes that \u201cif nation-states are going to survive, people in power must earn and keep the trust of the governed\u201d..<br />\n<br />\nThis fourth generation war is complex and long-term. It is decentralised, small in size and lacks hierarchy.<br />\n<br />\nThe strategy is to make a direct attack on the enemy\u2019s (in this case, the Indian state) culture, including genocidal acts against civilians and wage a highly sophisticated psychological and cultural warfare, especially through media manipulation and lawfare.<br />\n<br />\nAll available pressures are used \u2014 political, economic, social and military. For this purpose, legal professionals are required, media professionals are required, creative people, varied intellectuals and academicians are required, and civil society leaders are required, especially those who are connected with NGOs. It begins with low-intensity conflicts where all the actors attack from different platforms.<br />\n<br />\nIn 2004, the Communist Party of India (Marxist\u2013Leninist) People\u2019s War, usually called People\u2019s War Group, merged with the Maoist Communist Centre of India and formed the Communist Party of India (Maoist), pledging to the ideology of Marxism-Leninism-Maoism. The party became a member of the Coordination Committee of Maoist Parties and Organisations of South Asia.<br />\n<br />\nThis new entity drafted a blueprint for their urban movement/activities. It is believed that Kobad Ghandy, who was arrested in September 2009 in New Delhi, played a major role in the preparation of this urban perspective plan.<br />\n<br />\nThe document admits that the enemy is very strong in urban areas and therefore should never be engaged with until the conditions are favourable. And to make them favourable, it suggests the exploring and opening of opportunities, and organising people through front organisations.<br />\n<br />\nTarget the \u201cvulnerable group\u201d of minorities, women, Dalits, labourers and students through influencers who work undercover for a long time and accumulate strength. The document stresses on uniting industrial proletariats and students, and using them as vanguards who can play a direct role in revolution.<br />\n<br />\nThe city becomes the money source, shelter for cadre as transit points, source of weaponry and legal protection, medical aid, media attention and intelligentsia network.<br />\n<br />\nThe stronger the movement becomes in urban areas, the more likely it is to contribute to the agrarian revolution, in terms of providing leaders, men and material to the people\u2019s war.<br />\n<br />\nThe majority of the people in Maoist-affected areas and even their supporters and cadres have little to do with Maoism at the ideological level. They are only alienated and angry people with a sense of injustice, oppression and indignity.<br />\n<br />\nMaoists cleverly exploit this sentiment to their advantage \u2014 caste conflicts in Bihar, resentment against landlords in Andhra Pradesh, discontent against forest laws in tribal areas, unemployment amongst youth, radicalism among Muslims are all given the prescription of capture of power through the gun.<br />\n<br />\nWhile local grievances need to be effectively addressed through improved governance and ruthless accountability, there is an urgent need for creating mass awareness of the ultimate designs and consequences of what the extremists stand for.<br />\n<br />\nThe forest-based rebellion survives mostly on what Maoist ideologue Varavara Rao calls the \u201cmovement in urban areas\u201d. The network is in many cities, and sympathisers occupy prominent positions.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 4--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_7MN\" kind=\"m\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_7BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_7B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_8B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2251280051978801314\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_8M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_8.html?showComment=1528456775181#c2251280051978801314\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 8, 2018 at 4:49 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_8MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 3-<br />\n<br />\nConsider logistics support. In 2006, the police seized empty rocket shells and rocket launchers in Mahabubnagar district, Andhra Pradesh. The kingpin, \u201cTech Madhu\u201d, later surrendered to the police, which led to the detection of an elaborate network the Maoists had built.<br />\n<br />\nThe network originated in the industrial centre of Ambattur, a Chennai suburb, where rocket parts were fabricated, and stealthily transported in private commercial carriers to different parts of the country. The network is spread across five states: Tamil Nadu, Andhra, Madhya Pradesh, Chhattisgarh and Odisha.<br />\n<br />\nIn the cities, an invisible naxal-intelligentsia-media-academia-NGO-activist nexus works as strategic fortification with the ultimate aim of taking over the Indian state to achieve Maoist rule. The Maoists have identified Pune-Mumbai-Ahmadabad as the \u201cGolden Corridor\u201d, Delhi-Kanpur-Patna-Kolkata as the \u201cGanga Corridor\u201d. And Chennai-Coimbatore-Bengaluru as \u201cTri-junction\u201d.</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Key universities like Jawaharlal Nehru University (JNU), Jadavpur University (JU), Osmania University, Tata Institute of Social Sciences (TISS) would work as R&amp;D centres of urban naxalism.</span></div>\n<br />\nMaoist documents mention three kinds of urban mass organisations: secret, open and semi-open, and legal \u201cdemocratic\u201d organisations.<br />\n<br />\nThe legal organisations are the most dangerous for national security, as they try to subvert constitutional authority surreptitiously by building mass support through subtle manipulation of grievances against the state.<br />\n<br />\nThough government can ban the other two types of organisations, it is almost impossible to ban these legal organisations as civil society, human rights and other vigilante groups rush forth and create a hue and cry that the rights of the common man are being denied.<br />\n<br />\nThese organisations work closely with disgruntled groups of trade unions, student bodies, women\u2019s fronts, caste abolition organisations, nationality organisations, writers\u2019 associations, lawyers\u2019 organisations, teachers\u2019 associations, cultural bodies etc.<br />\n<br />\nNaxals are operating under the garb of human rights NGOs. These are manned by ideologues, including academicians and activists..<br />\n<br />\nThe tactics employed are extremely effective and media attention-grabbing. These range from using aggressive agitations and propaganda, provoking Dalits to take up arms, to programmes on anti-capitalist policies, to defunct/ fake controversies in history..<br />\n<br />\nThe activists take up genuine issues \u2014 not with the aim to solve them but to create unrest and anger against the system, and make people believe in armed struggle.<br />\n<br />\nAny activist working under banners with hints of revolution, like \u2018sangharsh\u2019 and \u2018kranti\u2019 must be profiled\u2026<br />\n<br />\nVaravara Rao said at a news conference in JU on 26 Feburary 2010, \u201cOur support is growing among students of Kolkata. Though these students don\u2019t come from tribal areas, they understand the situation.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nMany university campuses have been witnessing student unrest in the last few years. The common thread in all these institutes-turned-battlefields is a protest against the union government in the name of constitutional principles and democratic values.<br />\n<br />\nA closer look reveals that there is no suppression of \u201cdemocratic principles\u201d by the government. However, a picture has been painted so. Some faculty members too tried to escalate these protests through their active participation or supportive roles.<br />\n<br />\nAll this left the common man wondering \u201cHow did students turn anti-India?\u201d \u201cWhat is suddenly wrong with all these institutes?\u201d<br />\n<br />\nIn the cities, the front \u201cmass organisations\u201d are generally manned by ideologues, who include academicians and activists, fully committed to the party line and flush with foreign funds .<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 5--<br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_8MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_8BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_8B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_9B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6970134341533421355\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_9M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_8.html?showComment=1528456835307#c6970134341533421355\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 8, 2018 at 4:50 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_9MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 4--<br />\n<br />\nSuch organisations ostensibly pursue human rights-related issues and are adept at using the legal processes of the Indian state to undermine and emasculate enforcement action by the security forces. They also attempt to malign state institutions through propaganda and disinformation to further the cause of their \u201crevolution\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nFrom these mass organisations, individuals are selected, brainwashed for supporting and becoming members of the Maoist party.<br />\n<br />\nUrban areas are important for Maoists to get cadres who have the skill sets to perform military tasks; they are also critical for developing international networks, local intelligence, reaching medical aid to rural guerilla forces, as transit facility and for cyber warfare.<br />\n<br />\nOne more important reason for the Maoists\u2019 focus on urban areas in the last few years is the recruitment ebb they are facing in tribal areas as tribals began to understand the hollowness of Maoist ideology. Maoists are not getting recruits for their dalams (small units in their armed guerilla force). The number of surrenders has gone up manifold.<br />\n<br />\nThe history of students\u2019 and teachers\u2019 association with Maoism is as old as the movement itself. The Maoists\u2019 \u201cStrategy and Tactics of Indian Revolution\u201d document mentions the following about students\u2019 role:<br />\n<br />\nThe faces of urban naxalism are intellectuals, influencers and activists of importance. They indoctrinate the young by pretending to be concerned about social issues. However, they never make an attempt to find solutions to social problems. They only exploit the situation by organising protests and mobilising the impressionable youth.</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">They COMMIE PROFESSORS encourage students to take admission in colleges and fail their examinations so that they can continue longer on the campus. ..</span></div>\n<br />\nThe students don\u2019t mind as they get a handsome salary for just rabble rousing ... They hope to become political leaders like Yechury and Daniel Raja soon.<br />\n<br />\nWanna see Daniel Raja\u2019s JNU daughter ? She hopes to be a Commie leader like her back faced father..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iZTn0KTFoDs</span><br />\n<br />\nFor a student from a poor or marginalised background, a subsidised stay in a government hostel in a big city is a luxury which he laps up without questioning the ulterior motives of his mentors.<br />\n<br />\nWith the help of these students, the Maoists attract new students and organise \u201cboot study camps\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nUrban Maoists have employed multi-pronged tactics. They have infiltrated Maoist sympathisers in key public sector industries. It is not commie JNU babus anymore..<br />\n<br />\nThey have infiltrated critical departments like finance, military, police, power, IT, defence production and disrupt the activities from within by gaining control over the workers. Profile every union leader as a response..<br />\n<br />\nPassive protests and continuous grievances lead to a domino effect in an already disgruntled nation. They have infiltrates hospitals so that injured cadre can be treated in secrecy without police getting a whiff..<br />\n<br />\nUrban naxals are trained to bring a nation to its knees .<br />\n<br />\nNaxals are entrusted with the destruction of high-value targets like water/power or annihilation of individuals of importance. The identity of such members is unknown even to the local urban party structure.<br />\n<br />\nThe urban naxals have a unit for cyber warfare . The naxals are trained to use modern electronic means to infiltrate into the enemy\u2019s networks and collect vital information. These people are under the direct control of the highest party echelons. They are trained to generate cultural unrest with the help of propaganda platforms..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 6--<br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_9MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_9BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_9B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_10B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2974405746431847654\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_10M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_8.html?showComment=1528456867457#c2974405746431847654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 8, 2018 at 4:51 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_10MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 5--<br />\n<br />\nThis is covert warfare where the enemy is invisible and the battle is for the control of civil society \u2014 through coercion, controlling the hearts and minds of the people.<br />\n<br />\nFourth Generation Warfare (4GW). This war is waged by a blurring of the lines between war and politics, combatants and civilians. If they have reached this stage, we have no one but our political leaders to blame..<br />\n<br />\n4GW is decentralised, small in size and lacks hierarchy so that they cannot be stopped.<br />\n<br />\nThe strategy is to make a direct attack on the enemy's (Indian state) culture, including genocidal acts against civilians, and wage a highly sophisticated psychological and cultural warfare, especially through media manipulation and lawfare.<br />\n<br />\nAll available pressures are used \u2013 political, economic, social and military. For this purpose, legal professionals are required, media professionals are required, creative people, varied intellectuals and academicians are required, and civil society leaders are required, especially those who are connected with non-governmental organisations. It begins with low-intensity conflicts where actors attack from different platforms.<br />\n<br />\nHow did commies Kamalahassan, Prakash Raj , HardikPatel crawl out of the wood work?<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\"><br />INDIA WILL IMPLODE FROM WITHIN SOONER THAN LATER..&nbsp; &nbsp;THE WHITE MAN WILL NEVER ALLOW THE BROWN MAN TO LORD OVER HIM..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nMODI GOVT MUST SHOW SPINE..</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">Urban Naxalism is India\u2019s biggest threat today.</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\nLet us not celebrate that we got rid of the RED CORRIDOR.<br />\n<br />\nIt can\u2019t be fought by the government alone. It has to be fought by exposing them, which is a responsibility of every citizen who wants India to succeed.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/09/bauxite-mining-naxalite-menace-joshua.html</span><br />\n<br />\nRead all 8 parts of the post below\u2014<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; THIS SHOWED A&nbsp;<span style=\"color: red;\"><b>WOMAN WITH HER BREAST OUT, WITH A SMALL BABY SUCKING HER NIPPLE.</b></span></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIS MAGAZINE SOLD LIKE HOT CAKES.. BASICALLY FONDLING THE BREASTS..WITH PINK NIPPLES STANING OUT LIKE BULLETS ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE OTHER STALL HAD TWO NAKED DEAD BODIES EMBALMED IN STINKING FORMALDEHYDE -- ONE MAN AND ONE WOMAN WITH AGED SKIN DARK BROWN .. THE MAN HAD A VERY LARGE PRICK AND THE WOMEN A LARGE TWAT AND BIG BREASTS ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AS SOON AS THE MALE MEDICAL STUDENT SEES A YOUNG GOOD LOOKING GIRL, HE WOULD HOLD THE MANs PRICK USING FORCEPS -SLIDE THE FORESKIN OVER THE GLANS AND LAUNCH INTO AN EXPLANATION OF HOW PURUSHABEEJAM ( SEMEN ) CAME OUT FROM THE PEE HOLE ORIFICE BLAH BHAH..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SAME WHEN YOUNG MEN WENT TO THE DEAD FEMALE CADAVER, THE FEMALE MEDICAL STUDENT WOULD POKE HER FORCEPS INTO THE TWAT AND LAUNCH INTO AN EXPLANATION OF HOW THE SEMEN ENTERED THIS WAY AND HOW THE BABY IS BORN IN THE WOMB.. BLAH BLAH..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THEY KEPT ATTRACTIVE STUDENTS FOR THIS MORBID COMMENTARY ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">NEEDLESS TO SAY THE CYNOSURE OF ALL EYES WERE THE LARGE PRICK AND THE HAIRY TWAT.</span></div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">YES -- THIS IS THE ROT IN KERALA FOR YOU..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MEN WERE GETTING COLLECTIVE HARD ONs AND GIRLS WERE CREAMING FROM THEIR TWATS BY WATCHING THIS MORBID GRUESOME SCENE..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MY PARENTS NEVER BOUGHT A STALL TICKET SAYING IT IS NOT WORTH IT --&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SO I WENT WITH MY SCHOOL FRIEND.. ONLY ONCE \u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HOW DID KERALA AND BENGAL BECOME COMMUNIST HUBS ?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-decoration-line: none;\">November 8, 2018 at 9:38 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_80MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCaptain, is it possible that the rise of communism and their harrasment of industries, etc.....was intentional, so that they can create job-shortages in Kerala......thereby setting the stage for migration of Kerala's working population to the harsh-climate GCC nations ???<br /><br />If Kerala was industrialized and doing well, there would be zero incentive for a Keralite to go to GCC, South-East-Asia or even other parts of India........this means GCC would never have got the blue-&amp;-white-collar force they so desperately needed at the early stages of their development.</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_80BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">My wife was checking\nout her facebook page on her mobile.&nbsp; &nbsp;She read out one entry \u201d Why does Britain not\nhave an Independence day, when almost every other nation has one\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/08/communist-maoist-naxalite-movements-in.html?showComment=1471742636404#c6965554925471730647\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">August 21, 2016 at 6:53 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_103MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nonce on the ship my sindhi chief officer showed me his wedding video CD<br />\n<br />\nit was in taj crystal hall of mumbai--<br />\n<br />\nthere was lot of bollywood type dances as part of the wedding<br />\n<br />\nafter watching the CD i asked him \" HOW COME THERE ARE ONLY BOLD AND BEAUTIFUL GUESTS \" ?<br />\n<br />\nhe knew what i meant and looked most sheepish.<br />\n<br />\nmy elder sons engagement ceremony was in taj hotel calicut ( bride's expense )<br />\n<br />\nmy sons wedding reception was held in my home. the pandal which covered the whole house ( monsoon season ) itself costed me a fortune-- but it was held in my home for a reason.<br />\n<br />\ni was greeting the guests with my wife , when a young handsome guy walked in<br />\n<br />\none of my friends whispered -- you called this guy, he is the ice cream vendor at calicut beach front! &nbsp;how do you know him ? &nbsp;( &nbsp;possible GATE CRASHING? &nbsp;one of my rich neighbors held a wedding reception and before the main guests came , people gate crashed and the food got over &nbsp;)<br />\n<br />\ni replied \"it is a long story \" and moved away<br />\n<br />\nlater i reminisced --<br />\n<br />\n33 years ago i was sitting with my newly married wife on the sunset beach of calicut.<br />\n<br />\nmy wife told me \" there is a small muslim boy crying bitterly for the past 20 minutes sitting alone a few metres away \"<br />\n<br />\nafter 5 minutes , i saw he was still crying -- and more out of selfishness , i called him and asked him the reason for his great grief<br />\n<br />\nhe said he lost all his earnings accumulated for the past 3 days by selling snacks on the beach<br />\n<br />\ni asked him \"how much\"-- and then gave him the money from my purse .<br />\n<br />\nhe was hesitant to take it , but then i coaxed him , and he accepted with gratitude<br />\n<br />\nmuch later on in life, i attended his wedding --gave him a good cash gift. even later on i made sure he put his son in an english medium school.<br />\n<br />\nthese are human relationships --which can never fail<br />\n<br />\nand then i looked around -- many people were eating , i saw ex-servants, ex-cooks, ex-drivers , ex-gardners, current service providers like milkman, postman, vegetable vendor , fruit vendor, fisherman --all with their entire families .<br />\n<br />\none ex-cook ( christian ) was crying as she ate -- my wife had given her son money to go to dubai -these were tears of gratitude .<br />\n<br />\nif i held the reception in a big hotel, all of them would be afraid to come .<br />\n<br />\nthen another friend came to me --<br />\n<br />\nhe pointed out the muslim fisherman and asked me \"you called him for your son's wedding reception\" --sort of insinuating, that i am insulting other guests by having menial people around.<br />\n<br />\ni replied \" he is indeed a guest of honour \"<br />\n<br />\ni then reminisced-<br />\n<br />\nour biggest monthly budget expenditure at home in calicut if for fresh fish. all other expenses like petrol, communications, food etc are far lesser<br />\n<br />\nthe first call in the morning comes at 0545 hrs sharp-- this fisherman would be on the mobile and all i can hear is my wife asking in her sleep \" IS IT BIG ?\"<br />\n<br />\nby 0700 hrs the fisherman would be at the gates on his motorbike --with fresh fish sourced directly from the boats at sea .<br />\n<br />\none day my wife asked him\" why are you growing a long beard -- why do you look disturbed \"<br />\n<br />\nhe told her --his young wife could not move an inch and was bedridden ( spine problem ) . his small daughter was refusing to go to school as she has a ugly fungus growth coming out from her nose --<br />\n<br />\nhis cup of woe was overflowing<br />\n<br />\nmy wife gave him surgery expenses for both his wife and daughter<br />\n<br />\none day he arrived without a beard --and my wife knew his cup of joy was now overflowing again -both his wife and small daughter were OK .<br />\n<br />\nhe cried copious tears .<br />\n<br />\nhe told my wife \" You are a hindu woman --only you helped me. every muslim family , most of them far richer than you, knew my problem, but nobody helped \"<br />\n<br />\nthese are human relations --with very strong foundations .<br />\n<br />\nFUCK THE BOLD AND THE BEAUTIFUL !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Land Reforms Bill was\nintroduced in the Kerala Assembly in 1958 by the then EMS Namboodiripad-led\nCommunist Government.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The lands that were\nseized from the land-owning Hindus in the garb of equitable distribution to the\nlandless, eventually went into the possession Kerala Christians \u2013basically\ndalits and tribals who converted from Hindusim to Christianity --&nbsp; by the powerful Church , in return for land .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; Yet successive Kerala Christian and Commie govts have imported\nvegetabe oil from abroad. The cost of the coconut has remained steady since I\nwas in school.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The highest per-capita\nrate of suicide in agrarian areas is in Kerala. This has never been projected\nby the benami media.&nbsp; Of these suicides\nalmost all are Hindus, the victims of the Land Reforms Movement of the Communists.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4953678144368549657\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; line-height: 22.4px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_221M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"http://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">WHEN PM MODI WENT TO ISRAEL--STANDING AT THE END OF THE RECEPTION LINE WAS THE HEAD OF AHMEDDIYA SECT IN ISRAEL--PERSONALLY INTRODUCED TO MODI BY BENJAMIN NETANYAHU.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">I TOLD MY WIFE , WE WERE WATCHING LIVE -- THEY HAS TO BE AN AHMEDIYYA JEW PRETENDING TO BE A MUSLIM. SHE WAS VERY HAPPY WHEN I WAS VINDICATED<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">IN THE CASE OF GENIUS DIVYA NARENDRA , HIS SLEEING PARTNERS THE VINKLEVOSS TWINS HAD THE WHEREWITHAL TO SUE JEW MARK ZUCKERBERG --AND THEY CATAPULTED THEMSELVES TO FAME --USING A HOLLYWOOD MOVIE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">AT CORNELL ONCE A KOREAN UNDERGRADUATE BOY TEAMED UP WITH MY ELDER SON ( MASTERS ) FOR A PROJECT IN COMPUTER SCIENCE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">THEY DECIDED ON WHAT THEY WOULD DO.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">THE KOREAN BOY THEN WROTE THE ENTIRE CODE \"LIKE HOW HE WOULD WRITE A LETTER TO HIS FRIEND\"-- THIS WAS WHAT MY SON TOLD ME AND MY WIFE ON SKYPE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">AT FREQUENT INTERVALS HE WOULD CRAVE THE INDULGENCE OF MY SON\u2014IMPLORING \"SIR, AM I RIGHT\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MY SON WAS SO EMBARRASSED -- THE KOREAN DID THE WHOLE PROJECT IN ONE FLOWING SHOT -- LITERALLY THANKFUL WHEN MY SON SAID-- \" YES , CONTINUE\" TO HIS \" SIR- AM I RIGHT SO FAR ? \"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">WHEN THE CODE WAS WRITTEN AND TESTED -- MY ELDER SON TOLD HIM&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\"SO FAR YOU HAVE DONE EVERYTHING&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;-- I WILL WRITE THE FINAL PROJECT REPORT \"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">SO MY SON WROTE THE CODE PRESENTATION OVERNIGHT AND SHOWED IT TO THE KOREAN BOY THE NEXT DAY -- HE LOOKED ON MY SON AS AN ABSOLUTE HERO -- STARS IN HIS EYES AND CRIED \" WOW\u2014 I COULD HAVE NEVER DONE THIS , SIR\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MY SON WAS A SLEEPING PARTNER IN THIS PROJECT. HE WAS HONEST TO ADMIT IT .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MY SON INSISTED AND WROTE THE KOREAN BOYs NAME FIRST FOLLOWED BY HIS NAME-- THROUGH COLLEGE RULES REQUIRED THE MASTERs STUDENTS NAME FIRST AND THEN THE UNDERGRADUATE STUDENTs NAME<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">JEW ALBERT EINSTEIN WAS A MEDIOCRE BRAIN\u2014HE WAS ABSOLUTE DISGRACE IN MATH\u2014EINSTEIN DID NOT HAVE A MATHEMATICAL BRAIN-- HE OUTSOURCED ALL HIS MATH..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">ALL HIS AWARD WINNING IDEAS OF EINSTEIN IS STOLEN FROM FROM VEDAS AND SECONDARY ONES -- STOLEN FROM AN INTELLECTUAL PATENT POOL OF WHICH HE WAS CLEVERLY PLACED AS THE GUARDIAN CLERK BY JEW ROTHSCHILD<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">SRINIVASAN RAMANUJAN THE INDIAN MATH GENIUS --LOST HIS DIARY, IN WHICH HE HAD RECORDED ALL HIS PRICELESS FINDINGS . THE JEW BASTARDS STOLE IT.
