text-decoration-line: none;\">December 10, 2017 at 9:07 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_158MC\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttp://www.timesnownews.com/india/article/banaras-hindu-university-triple-talaq-nikkah-halala-alauddin-khilji-political-science-question-paper-ma-students-master-of-arts-degree/143420<br />\n<br />\nNOBODY IN INDIA HEARD OF CHAITANYA MAHAPRABHU AND THE BHAKTI MOVEMENT TILL THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA..'<br />\n<br />\nCHAITANYA MAHAPRABHU AND BHAKTI MOVEMENT ARE JEW ROTHSCHILDs FAKE AND BACKDATED CREATIONS.<br />\n<br />\nSANATANA DHARMA ALLOWS ONLY SHRADDHA --NEVER BHAKTI....<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nAll the BHAKTI MOVEMENT HEROES are FAKE and backdated creations of Jew Rothschild who ruled India \u2014the most famous being the DASA characters .<br />\n<br />\nJew Rothschild\u2019s historians LIED that Bhakti movement was a revival, reworking and recontextualisation of ancient Vedic traditions..<br />\n<br />\nIn Sanatana Dharma the six virtues are Sama, dama, uparati, titiksha, SHRADDHA and samadhana..<br />\n<br />\nLord Krishna also gives importance to Shraddha and says in the Bhagavad Gita:--<br />\n<br />\nOne who has Shraddha ( not BHAKTI ) gains knowledge.<br />\n<br />\nShraddha hrudayya yakutyaa shradhayaa vindate vasu. --(Rig Veda 10/151/4) 5000 BC.<br />\nMeaning: Shraddha (faith) is the symbol of the high sentiment of the heart.<br />\n<br />\nShraddha cannot be aptly translated into English. Loosely put, it may be be called faith / trust.<br />\n<br />\nYour willingness to know the unknown is shraddha...shraddha is not blind faith, but enlightened faith based on verification.<br />\n<br />\nIf your mind is fixed, and says \u201cThat\u2019s it. I know it all\u201d, that is ego. The more you know, the more will be the feeling that you don\u2019t know. Recognition of the unknown is Shraddha....<br />\n<br />\nShraddha means unwavering faith in the sacred scriptures or shastras and in the moral codes they contain as well as in the atma ( soul )...<br />\n<br />\nThe shastras are designed to ensure the peace and prosperity of the world and the spiritual perfection of mankind..<br />\n<br />\nThis is not blind faith like is SINGLE MESSIAH, SINGLE HOLY BO RELIGIONS...<br />\n<br />\nIt is based on accurate reasoning, evidence and experience. Then only it can be lasting faith. Then only it can be perfect, unshakeable faith....<br />\n<br />\nSuperstitious beliefs, beliefs in mere religious traditions ( like AGAMA ) or social customs cannot help one in spiritual advancement......<br />\n<br />\nNo spiritual progress is possible without shraddha. ..From shraddha comes nistha or one-pointed devotion and from nistha comes self-realization. If the faith is flickering, it will die soon and the aspirant will be drifted aimlessly hither and thither...<br />\n<br />\nAncient maharishis talked about the quality of \u201cshraddha\u201d which is a positive energy that comes from within. ..<br />\n<br />\nShraddha should not be translated as a \u201csimple\u201d faith / trust, --it also conveys mental and intellectual firmness...<br />\n<br />\nSINGING BHAJANS LIKE ASSHOLES ( BHAKTI MOVEMENT OF JEW ROTHSCHILD ) BEATING DHOLAKS AND SHAKING ASS , HAS NEVER BEEN PART OF HINDUISM.<br />\n<br />\nBHAJANS IN VERNACULAR ARE NOT MANTRAS IN SANSKRIT..<br />\n<br />\nIn the opening verses of the 17th chapter OF Bhagwad Gita , Krishna says that faith results from our most steadfast convictions.<br />\n<br />\nWhen our mind is pure, he says, we find faith in benevolence, having little attachment to what we ourselves can gain.<br />\n<br />\nAt such times, faith leads us to value yoga as a means for curtailing sorrow and suffering, and for directing our mind toward transcendental truths.<br />\n<br />\nYoga itself is an act of faith arising from the heart, and by having faith in the fundamental aims of yoga, \u201ca faithful person obtains knowledge.\u201d (Bhagawad Gita 4.39- 4000 BC)<br />\n<br />\nA Hindu free of BHAKTI dogma ( like in other single holy book religions ) is skeptical when this question of trust / faith arises because faith is always understood to be blind faith.<br />\n<br />\nShraddha is more than mere faith. It also implies self\u2013reliance, an independent sense of right and wrong, reliance on conscience and the courage of one\u2019s own conviction<br />\n<br />\nSHRADDA WAS REPLACED BY BHAKTI (BLIND DEVOTION ) AND SANATANA DHARMA WAS HIJACKED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD ..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_158BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; A teacher wants students to understand, to know, unlike a SINGLE HOLY BOOK DOGMA preacher who wants listeners to believe.<br />\n<br />\nA physics professor doesn't want his students to believe in atoms; he wants them to understand. In the same way, Hindu Gurus and spiritual texts do not command you to believe; they lead you to understand.<br />\n<br />\nThe goal, as understood by the ancient rishis, is not to merely believe in God, but to know God directly.<br />\n<br />\nShraddha is the first step in one's search for God. In the fourth chapter of the Bhagavad Gita, Sri Krishna says, \"shraddhavan labhate jnanam, one with shraddha gains knowledge.<br />\n<br />\nCheck out the FAKE Bhakti movement heroes-- 12 Alvars , 63 Nayanars, Andal, Basava, Bhagat Pipa, Allama Prabhu, Akka Mahadevi, Kabir, Tulsidas, Kabirdas, Kalidas, Ramdas, Chandidas , Surdas , Ravidas, Gusainji, Ghananand, Ramananda Sripadaraja, Vyasatirtha, Purandara Dasa, Kanakadasa, Vijaya Dasa, Six goswamis of Vrindavan , Raskhan, Jayadeva Goswami, Namdev, Eknath, Tukaram, Mirabai, Ramprasad Sen, Sankardev, Vallabha Acharya, Narsinh Mehta, Gangasati,Chaitanya Mahaprabhu etc etc .<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nEVEN ADI SHANKARACHARYA WAS CONVERTED TO A BHAKTI CHARACTER<br />\n<br />\nTHIS FOUL AND CUNNING SUBSTITUTION OF SHRADDHA WITH BHAKTI, IN THE WARP AND WEFT OF HINDUISM BY JEW ROTHSCHILD REDUCED THE GREAT SPIRITUALITY OF SANATANA DHARMA TO THE ABSURD LEVEL OF SINGLE HOLY BOOK/ SINGLE MESSIAH RELIGIONS ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE BHAKTI LIE IS NOW BUSTED FOREVER<br />\n<br />\nHINDUISM IS NOW BEING ATTACKED FROM WITHIN BY TRAITORS IN THE PAYROLL OF FOREIGN FORCES<br />\n<br />\nPUT THIS COMMENT IN THE WEBSITES OF ALL HINDUS ORGS \u2026SPREAD ON SOCIAL MEDIA \u2026 ALSO PUT IN THE WEBSITES OF PMO, PM MODI, HOME MINISTER, LAW MINISTER, CJI, EDUCATION MINISTER, DEFENCE MINISTER, FINANCE MINISTER, SUSHMA SWARAJ, SMRITI IRANAI, SWAMY, GURUMURTHY, YOGI ADITYANATH ..<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b>THIS POST IS NOW CONTINUED TO PART 66, BELOW-</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-MM3VxqCyN6s/V7FWOckeprI/AAAAAAABLUs/2uMy8NNetzUDcVkX98c7vujPKtmM7JxCgCLcB/s1600/nintchdbpict0002593dd61804.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"426\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-MM3VxqCyN6s/V7FWOckeprI/AAAAAAABLUs/2uMy8NNetzUDcVkX98c7vujPKtmM7JxCgCLcB/s640/nintchdbpict0002593dd61804.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>Can a lightning bolt strike\nthe same place, thrice ?<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>You bet your cotton\npickin' ass it sure can !</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Usain Bolt has just\nroared into Olympic history, capturing an unprecedented third consecutive 100\nmetres crown to confirm his top cherry place in the pantheon of the greatest\nathletes the world has seen.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">SUPER ATHLETE USAIN\nBOLT TRANSCENDS SPORT , BY MAKING THE IMPOSSIBLE LOOK MUNDANE.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">SPORT DOES NOT GET ANY\nBIGGER THAN THIS.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>We the denizens of the\nplanet are grateful to Usain Bolt for not robbing us off our opium.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No other athlete \u2014 man\nor woman \u2014 has won three consecutive individual Olympic sprint titles.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Usain Bolt has now\nmoved into the realms of living legends and THE greatest athlete ever. For the\n100 metres dash is the most played sport on this planet.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is NOT some bullshit\ncurling ( spare me!), fencing, boat pulling, horse jumping, wind surfing, beach\nvolleyball ,&nbsp; gymnastics , synchronized\nswimming, etc, Western nations have made and introduced to gain easy medals to\nshow a good medal tally and hence racial superiority.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bolt trailed yank\nJustin Gatlin till the 70 metre mark , but roared back to win in style. It took\nUsain Bolt just 9.81 seconds to prove he is still the fastest man in the\nworld.&nbsp; An almighty roar went around the\nstadium and a sigh of relief from the sport.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bolt, the most\ndecorated sprinter of all time, made history by becoming the first Olympic\nathlete to win three consecutive gold medals in the 100 meters. Having already\ntaken home gold for the event in Beijing 2008 and London 2012,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The full standings<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Usain Bolt (JAM) - 9.81<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Justin Gatlin (USA) -\n9.89<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Andre De Grasse (CAN) -\n9.91<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The planet went\nberserk-- for it is impossible to hate this man.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With this 100-meter win\nat Rio Olympics , Usain Bolt upholds his incredible record of having never been\ndefeated on the track in an Olympic or world championship race. He hold the\nworld and olympic records..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 6-foot-5 Jamaican, who turns 30 on the final\nday of the Summer Games, has declared that Rio will be his final Olympics.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Usain Bolt went into\nwisdom mode after the race -<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Somebody said I\ncan become immortal. Two more medals to go and I can sign off. Immortal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I am just happy that I\nwon and that's the key thing.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bolt galloped away in\ncelebration after this amazing win, basking in the adulation of the stadium and\neven taking selfies with fans during his lap of honour. For once people on the\nplanet appreciated a selfie taking man.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The victory left Bolt standing alone in the 120-year history of\nsprinting in the modern Olympic games.&nbsp;\nIt also leaves Bolt on track to complete an incredible\n\"triple-triple\" of clinching 100m, 200m and 4x100m relay titles for a\nthird consecutive Olympics.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He then delighted the\njam packed stadium with his traditional \"lightning bolt\" pose as\nreggae blasted out of the stadium sound system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then it took him about\nfive minutes to take to social media and dedicate the win to \"his\npeople.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Usain Bolt tweeted -<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: red;\">Jamaica Stand Up!!!<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As the 8 best\nsuper-sprinters of the planet hunkered down, at the blocks , the electric\ntension in the stadium was palpable\u2014nay \u2013you could cut it with a knife.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Slow out of the blocks?\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Who cares ,if you\nare&nbsp; Usain Bolt.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He usually stumbles off\nthe blocks last in a ungainly manner.&nbsp; He\nhas this bad habit of switching on his after burners only after the whole field\nis ahead of him <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bolt sprinting to the\n60 metres mark,&nbsp; to arrive at his\nfavourite part of the race --cheeks puffing, arms pumping right along with each\nof those lengthy strides.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Witness this--</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Usain\nnow switches on the transition phase--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pulling away from the\npack with every long stride, Bolt surges ahead and overwhelms the star-studded\nfield .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">9.81 seconds later , at\nthe finish line Bolt raised his index finger, and then, the real party began.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-zYDxQRxGlF0/V7F9dEXJ9LI/AAAAAAABLVs/-BIfnsd2-Hkzj5shTBXgQjJUqej_AziIgCLcB/s1600/15TRACK-3151-superJujjmbo-v3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"426\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-zYDxQRxGlF0/V7F9dEXJ9LI/AAAAAAABLVs/-BIfnsd2-Hkzj5shTBXgQjJUqej_AziIgCLcB/s640/15TRACK-3151-superJujjmbo-v3.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The planet went nuts !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE character--&nbsp; Usain Bolt , gave us all on this planet , our\ngreatest moment of sporting history! <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chants of \"Bolt,\nBolt, Bolt'' rang out from the near-capacity stadium. What a delectable moment\nin history.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The show lived up to\nits billing, and how !</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bolt, as ever, was in\nthe mood for partying - cavorting, clowning, delighting the capacity crowd with\nhis full range of showman celebrations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bolt unlaced his\nnow-famous gold spikes .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-L7TPf6-FJW4/V7FWqYnGQII/AAAAAAABLUw/xHuKX3y7qlUN27h7pVz5EgQQATYhfJPKACLcB/s1600/nintchdbpict000259tt367230.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"428\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-L7TPf6-FJW4/V7FWqYnGQII/AAAAAAABLUw/xHuKX3y7qlUN27h7pVz5EgQQATYhfJPKACLcB/s640/nintchdbpict000259tt367230.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He turned his yellow hat backward, kneeled down and\ngave the crowd what it really wanted -- that famous, arching, \"To the\nWorld'' pose that he debuted eight years ago in Beijing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"A true, true\nwarrior of the sport,'' said Yohan Blake, Bolt's Jamaican teammate&nbsp; \"To come back ... and win it three\ntimes. He is a one-of-a-kind sprinter. He really is.''<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bolt, who holds the\nworld record of 9.58 seconds, injured his hamstring six weeks ago<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The imperiousness with\nwhich Usain Bolt demolished the vocal doubts over his infallibility, made the\ndenizens of this planet wonder why did they ever doubt him.&nbsp;&nbsp; Is he still the best? Are his best years\nbehind him? Is he lazy?&nbsp; Is he too laid\nback for a world class sprinter?<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only one man could have\nreally stood between Bolt and history and that was Gatlin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">America still has no\nanswer to Usain\u2019s speed.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/aqha5sM_TmU/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/aqha5sM_TmU?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Allow me to reminisce\n--<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>At Beijing 4 years ago,\nwhen Usain Bolt being himself, had showboated,&nbsp;\nimmediately his uppity detractors including IOC president Jacques fuckin' Rogge,\ncondemned Bolt and wanted to blackball him and strip him off the gold medal ,\nfor showing disrespect.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>They had done it in the\npast for the infamous\" black power salute\", -- to John Carlos and\nTommy Smith ( he smashed the world record in this 200 metres event ) in the\n1968 Mexico Olympics. They were on familiar ground.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>This was just a \"\nhuman rights salute\" -- misinterpreted to suit the white man's mood\nswings. In that era the black man was an full American with full rights and\nrespect only during Olympics-- and that too only the world record holders. &nbsp;A\ndevout and articulate black Catholic man could NOT even be a priest. The ball\nwas surely moving this ominous way..<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>How dare a mangy black\nman misbehave in this manner-- only the white Yank like superbrat John McEnroe\ncan be allowed to get away with this type of bad behaviour, right?.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Then someone had\nsuggested . Usain is now the people's darling.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>There will be riots\nwithin the \u201caway from home\u201d Chinese stadium. This Olympics will have to be\naborted , if you ever make this silly immature mistake, and you might get a\npublic lynching too.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The people of this\nplanet will NOT accept such a gross decision inflicted on this living legend.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Jamaican minister\nEdmund Barlett vigorously supported Bolt , switched himself to wisdom mode and\nopined tersely \"&nbsp; The celebrations\nare appropriate. You have to see the glory of dem moment!\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>USA has the\n\"lobbying\" powers to destroy the international careers of judges and\nreferees --and all are wary. The American all time pride is still Florence\nGriffith Joyner (Flo-Jo) , who wore one inch of make up , one legged\nleotards,&nbsp; different coloured shoes and 3\ninch long artificial painted nails to camouflage her manliness.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Chemical woman Florence\nGriffith Joyner&nbsp; was the first world\nathelete ever to be booed off a stadium<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>BBC had shown to the\nworld how her voice has changed from a girl's to a man's in 3 years flat. She\nhad muscles popping out from everywhere. She has set records in 100 and 200\nmetres races which may never be broken. Flo-Jo paid the price and died at the young\nage of 38.&nbsp;&nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Prior to the Olympic games in\nSeoul, she prematurely cut her European tour short, after being booed off the\ntrack by the whole angry stadium.. She had gone there to do daylight fuc#in'\nrobbery.&nbsp; She and her sister Jackie\nJoyner Kersee are known as the \"chemical sisters\" and world athletics\nis permanently scarred by this slimy duo.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Justin Gatlin who got\nthe silver medal&nbsp; was booed as soon as he\nentered the Rio stadium.&nbsp; Gatlin won the\ngold in the 2004 Olympics, but had to sit out of the 2008 Games due to a drug\nsuspension.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>After the race while\nBolt was celebrating with anyone he could find, Gatlin was parading the\nAmerican flag around the track virtually alone. <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The boos from the\nBrazilian crowd were the latest ugly chapter in Gatlin's saga. &nbsp;He has been\ncaught twice for doping. His last ban ended in 2010. &nbsp;</i></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Gatlin served a\nfour-year ban that was twice reduced, first from a lifetime then to eight years-thanks\nto American clout..</i></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>But fans in the stadium\nbought into the \"Good vs. Evil\" storyline that has been pitched by\nthe media for all these years, and they let the American have it. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></i></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Bolt was saluted as\nhero, Gatlin was cast in the role of pantomime villain..</i></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"That's the first\ntime I've gone into a stadium and they've started to boo,\" Bolt said.\n\"It surprised me.\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>When Usain Bolt won the\ngold in the 100 metres dash of Beijing Olympics, 4 years ago, jealous Carl\nLewis scuttled his&nbsp; grace, frothed from\nhis mouth and bitched. He insinuated that Bolt (who is taller and fitter than\nhim) , took drugs as his timing was out of this world<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Carl Lewis kept\nreminding us how Usain Bolt's ( who is taller and fitter , which meant he can\neat up more real estate per stride ) achievements are drug assisted-- all this\nfrom a drug tainted athlete himself.</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The golden boy Carl\nLewis of the USA failed a drugs test not once , no not twice , but thrice , in\nthe lead up to the Olympic games in Seoul 1988. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>None the less the\nAmerican Olympic Committee saw fit to ignore this fact and allow him represent\nthe USA in the 88 Olympics . <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Lewis has now\npersonally acknowledged that he failed three tests during the 1988 US Olympic\ntrials, which under international rules at the time should have prevented him\nfrom competing in the Seoul games two months later.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Lewis, said he was not\nconcerned about the uproar around the world caused by the revelations.\n\"It's ridiculous. Who cares?\" he had said. <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>So how about Carl fuckin' Lewis\nthe CHEAT or Florence Griffith fuckin' Joyner the CHEAT --rather that BEN Johnson the\ncheat? &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><i>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</i></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Oh we forgot\u2014 unlike\nRussians , Yanks are exempted , right?</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Carl Lewis, who has\nalways been miserly with praise for Bolt, has now lost his place in history,\nwhere Bolt now reigns supreme.&nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Carl Lewis will do well to remember that he won\n4 gold Olympic medals at the truncated Los Angeles Olympics of 1984, which the\nEastern block ( half the world ) boycotted. These sheenless gold medals are\nhalf size\u2014 nay\u2014 semi fuckin' circular.</i><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-MWm_0qPKOJE/V7FlT3B-wsI/AAAAAAABLVc/0rDkD4TSBwwK-3r2QIsOUiEibZWzu-uwACLcB/s1600/usain-bolt-rio-finaDDl-win.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"454\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-MWm_0qPKOJE/V7FlT3B-wsI/AAAAAAABLVc/0rDkD4TSBwwK-3r2QIsOUiEibZWzu-uwACLcB/s640/usain-bolt-rio-finaDDl-win.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">USA will have a Bolt\ncomplex for ever, from now on. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Usain Bolt has snatched\naway their sole bragging rights.&nbsp; We all\nknow how hard USA tried to IMPORT Usain Bolt , over the years, by offering\nsops.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I guess it will never\never cross India's mind to wean away a world class athlete from a\nimpoverished&nbsp; African country, by giving\nfinancial incentives,&nbsp; the way the white\nChristians nations are doing in a shameless manner.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This took the cake -- At\nthe London Olympics the 80000 odd crowd went crazy when Usain Bolt waved at\nthem in a \"royal\" manner akin to that of Queen Elizabeth II, the pathetic\nBritish monarch.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">--unadulterated madness\u2014<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No man has ever looked\nso utterly comfortable in his own skin and his place in the world, before any\nrace..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The entire planet ,\nincluding \"yours truly\" glued on to their TVs, went wild as Bolt\ndelivered on his promise of winning when it counts most.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The capacity\ncrowd,&nbsp; like the cat who swallowed all\nthe cream,&nbsp; basked in the glow of another\nunforgettable performance from the 6-foot-5 speed machine.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">2008 Olympic Games,\nBeijing&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 9.69 - world record<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">tatra dhyanajam\nanashayam<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">karmashuklakrishnnam\nyoginah trividham itaresham<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">tatastadvipakanugunanam\nevabhivyaktirvasananam<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">jatideshakalavyavahitanam\napyanantaryamsmritisanskarayoh ekaroopatvat<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">tasam anaditvam\nchashisho nityatvat<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">hetufalashrayalambanaih\nsangrihitatvad eshamabhave tadabhavah<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">atitanagatan\nsvaroopatostyadhvabhedad<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">te vyaktasookshma\ngunatmanah<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">parinamaikatvad vastutattvam<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">vastusamye chittabhedat\ntayorvibhaktah panthah<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">taduparagapekshatvat\nchittasya vastu jnatajnatam<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">sada\njnatashchittavrittayastatprabhohpurushasyaparinamitvat<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">na tat\nsvabhasandrishyatvat<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ekasamaye\nchobhayanavadharannam<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">chittantaradrishye\nbuddhibuddheratiprasanggah smritisankarashcha<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">chiterapratisankramayastadakarapattausvabuddhisanvedanam<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">drashtridrishyoparaktan\nchittan sarvartham<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">tadasankhyeyavasanachitram\napi pararthan sanhatyakaritvat<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">visheshadarshin\naatmabhavabhavanavinivrittih<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">tada vivekanimnan kaivalyapragbharan\nchittam<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">tachchhidreshu\npratyayantarani sanskarebhyah<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">hanam esham\nkleshavaduktam<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">prasankhyanepyakusidasy\nsarvathavivekakhyaterdharmameghah samadhih<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">tatah\nkleshakarmanivrittih<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">tada\nsarvavarannamalapetasyjnanasyaanantyajgyeyam alpam<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">tatah kritarthanan\nparinamakramapari samaptirgunanam<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">kshannapratiyogi\nparinamaparantanigrarhyah kramah <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">purusharthashoonyanan\ngunanan pratiprasavahkaivalyan, svaroopapratishtha va chitishaktireti<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4.01 - - -</span> </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">janmaushadhimantratapahsamadhijah\nsiddhayah</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Accomplishments may be\nattained through birth, the use of herbs, incantations, self-discipline or\nsamadhi. <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are five types of\naccomplished yogis (siddhayah): ---1. by aspiration to become perfect (janma) ,2.\nby spiritual experience gained through herbs, drugs or soma elixir (ausadha) ,3.\nby incantation of the name of one's desired deity (mantra) ,4. by ascetic\ndevotional practice (tapas) ,5. by profound meditation (samadhi) ..There is an\nimportant distinction between these means of spiritual accomplishment.\nFollowers of the first three may fall from the grace of yoga through pride or\nnegligence. The others, whose spiritual gains are through tapas and samadhi, do\nnot. They become masters, standing alone as divine, liberated souls, shining\ninstances to mankind. For a Sadhaka, who is adept in Samyama, siddhis &nbsp;are very normal. In fact, their frequent use\ngets him away from the best of all Siddhis, namely, Kaivalya. &nbsp;Apart from Samyama, are there any other\nmethods by which a sadhaka gets various Siddhis? The first is by birth. Lord\nKrishna has told Arjuna in the Bhagawad Gita that whatever attainments one\ncomes to, in one birth, all these attainments come along with him into his next\nbirth. They do not go waste. All of us are thus born with the gift of what we\nattained in our previous birth. It is just that it is not easily visible to all..\nSomeone may seem to have learnt something too very fast in this birth and is\ncalled precocious. But, this precociousness has come to him from his previous\nbirth, based on his earlier karma and earlier attainments. While Mantra is\nfocusing the sound power, tapah is focusing the mind waves or thought waves. &nbsp;Siddhis (attainments, powers, perfections,\nsubtle experiences, psychic abilities) are exposed from the subtle level by the\nthinning of the veils between the conscious and the unconscious. However, for\nthe absolute reality to be realized, there also has to be non-attachment , and\nsetting aside of experiences , so as to move ever closer to the direct\nexperience of the center . Otherwise, removing the veil in one of these five\nways can serve only to achieve subtle experiences and powers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">4.02-- - jatyantaraparinamah\nprakrityapoorat</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The abundant flow of\nnature's energy brings about a transformation in one's birth, aiding the\nprocess of evolution. </span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just as water can be\ntransformed into vapour or ice, likewise, sufferings and fluctuations can be\nbrought under control and transformed by crushing avidya. If a sadhaka fails to\nreach perfection during this life, nature may abundantly permeate and perfect\nhis sadhana in the next, so that he may then experience freedom. The soul carries\nforward into the next life, its positive samskaras and impressions. This is the\nmeaning of soul evolution. Many sages like Adi shankaracharya reached kaivalya\nduring their lives here on earth without yogic sadhana, because of the fruits\nof yogic practices in their previous lives (jatyantara parinama).&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">4.03-- - nimittam\naprayojakan prakritinan varannabhedastu tatah kshetrikavat</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Nature's efficient\ncause does not impel its potentialities into action, but helps to remove the\nobstacles to evolution, just as a farmer builds banks to irrigate his fields. </span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Culture of the\ngerminated consciousness is of profound importance in yoga. As a farmer builds\ndykes between fields to regulate the flow of water via slice gates , evolved\nyogis channelise the rich flow of nature's energy to liberate themselves from\nthe bondage of their actions and develop spiritual insight. Even if sadhana\nfails to give rise to complete transformation in the life of a sadhaka, it\ncertainly serves to remove hindrances in the path of his soul evolution. Through\nyogic discipline, the yogi removes all obstacles to his evolution, and relishes\nemancipation. Thus disciplined, the yogi's enhanced energy spontaneously\nremoves all fluctuations and afflictions which thwart his spiritual growth,\nenabling him to gain insight into his very being, his soul. In meditation, we\nare not trying to attain anything, but are trying to open the sluice gates. We\ncannot really attain anything in meditation, but can only realize what is\nalready there. This is why the phrase Self-realization is used for\nenlightenment. Chitta vrittis create various obstacles to our sprouting into\ngreat Yogis. We only need to remove these obstacles one by one, process by\nprocess. The entire prakriti will help us to grow \u2013 only if we remove all the\nobstacles within us and a few outside us. Patanjali, declares that the true\nsecret of evolution is the manifestation of the perfection which is already in\nevery being; that this perfection has been barred, and the infinite tide behind\nit is struggling to express itself. These struggles and competitions are but\nthe results of our ignorance, because we do not know the proper way to unlock\nthe sluice gate and let the water in.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">4.04- - - nirmannachittanyasmitamatrat</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Constructed or created\nmind springs from the sense of individuality (asmita). </span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Asmita is characterised\nby thoughts such as \u201cI am better than you\u201d, \u201cI am right\u201d, \u201cI know more than\nyou\u201d. As humans we are all subject to asmita (ego). In fact we all need a\nlittle bit of ego to have a healthy view of ourselves! But when it becomes a\ndominant force in how we communicate and make decisions it can bring suffering\nto our lives.&nbsp; From a sense of\nself-awareness, numerous activities become associated in one's consciousness,\nthereby giving rise to mental states called moods, which form themselves into\nnirmita, or cultivated citta. They ruin, distort and disturb the intelligence,\ncreating various sufferings and fluctuations. If this distorted consciousness\nis re-channelled in the right direction, it develops sophistication and\nsensitivity. Then nirmita citta changes into nirmana, or sasmtta, citta, or a\nsense of sattvic individuality, and nature makes the intelligence wise, which\nin turn keeps the consciousness pure. &nbsp;This\nsutra explains the quality of constructive and creative mind through asmita.\nThe seat of the mind-matter is the brain. It produces fluctuations, bias and\nprejudices, which cause pain and distress, and need to be held back. &nbsp;The mind at its source is single and pure. It\nis known as the core of the being (atman) or the seat of the spiritual heart.\nWhen it sprouts into a seedling, it becomes the self-conscious centre\n(antahkarana), and forms sasmita or a sense of sattvic individuality. This\ndevelops into consciousness {citta), which branches out into ego (ahamkara),\nintelligence (buddhi) and mind (manas). These manifest themselves as multiple\nthought-waves, which, if allowed free play, give rise to sufferings and\nwaverings (vyutthana citta). &nbsp;By regular\npractice, the fire of yoga develops the sadhaka's ability to discriminate\nbetween the original mind and its offshoots, single mind and multifaceted,\ncomplex mind. He does this by careful observation of his behaviour,\nchannelising his energies to retrace the source of these thought-waves (citta\nvrttis) and exterminate them at their very source. This is santa citta or\nsamahita citta, which takes the sadhaka to the threshold of the single state of\nconsciousness, and converts the sprouted or created consciousness into a\ncultured consciousness - nirmana citta. This, in turn, traces the core of his\nindividual existence. This becomes meditation - dhyana, at which point the\ndistortions of the multiple mind disappear. The conscious awareness of head and\nheart unite, and the consciousness becomes mature and pure (divya ana). This\npure citta is the root consciousness - miila citta. For instance, one can\ncompare the single state of consciousness to the trunk of a tree and the\nmultiple minds to the branches of the tree. Though these branches shoot out\nfrom the main trunk, they remain in contact with it. Similarly, the sadhaka has\nto draw back the branches of consciousness, i e., the 'I' consciousness, from\nthe head towards its base, so as to lose its identity. &nbsp;Asmita (ego) is the first branch growing from\nthe tree whose roots are bound in avidya (wrong understanding) As with the\nother four klesa-s, asmita builds a wall between our true self and the false\nself. When we attach ourselves to our job title, role, bank account, house\nsize, physical ability and the like we are seeing ourselves through the false\nself. The curtain is drawn preventing the light from shining through. When the\nfalse self is the one we relate to the most we will experience suffering,\nunease, states that can lead us down the path of depression or negative\nemotions (or injury in the yoga class!). We all know false identification is\neasy to fall into in our world. There is so much to distract us and draw us\noutwards, away from what is deep inside.&nbsp;\nConsciously exploring who we really are takes work. Practices like yoga\nor other meditative disciplines can assist to filter out the rubbish we\naccumulate in our minds and draw back the curtain that is covering the light.\nThen our own truth can be revealed.&nbsp; There\nare five colorings or kleshas (2.3), and that these emerge sequentially. First\nis avidya, or ignorance (2.4, 2.5), and then comes I-ness, individuality or\nasmita (2.6). Then after there is an individuality, it starts to take on, or\nwrap itself (1.4) in all sorts of attractions (2.7) and aversions (2.8).\nFinally, once all of this false identity has been assumed, there is the fear of\nthe loss of those identities (2.9). In such a way, the mind emerges out of the\nsubtler form. The advanced yogi has mastery even over this process of mind\nemerging out of the root I-ness or asmita.&nbsp;\nAll these artificially constructed minds have actually evolved from our\nego or the feeling of I-ness.&nbsp; This Ego\nstands at the center of the artificial minds and goes on inflating the\nartificial minds in all directions.&nbsp; This\nartificial, constructed minds create thoughts, feelings, relationships,\nsocieties to live-in, our mutual likes and dislikes and our whole life pattern.&nbsp; Our mind-fields consisting of all of our\nthoughts, memories, feelings etc are all constructed by our asmita or Ego\nidentity only. The I-ness in us is directly responsible for all of our sinful\nand sacred acts. Likewise, all of our thoughts and memories spring from this\nI-ness thought only.&nbsp; But, Yogi can\nconstruct the type of I-ness identities that serve him well in his endeavours\nfrom the same Asmita itself.&nbsp; Behind all\ncreated mind-fields, there is also a mind-field, which is original and not\ncreated by our Egos. We have come to this world with this uncreated, original\nmind-field. The whole effort of Sadhaka is to reach the clean slate of this\nuncreated, original mind-field.&nbsp; With\nexceptional mental faculties an individual can influence the mental state of\nother beings. The Purusa itself is never changed. Whatever you do never\ndestroys your own glory, your own nature, because the soul cannot be acted upon\nby anything, only a veil is spread before it, hiding&nbsp; its perfection.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">4.05- - - pravrittibhede\nprayojakam chittam ekam anekesham</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Consciousness is one,\nbut it branches into many different types of activities and innumerable\nthought-waves. </span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consciousness, though\nsingle, directs multiple thoughts, sometimes creating discrepancies between\nwords and deeds. It is indirectly responsible for several activities, and\nbecomes the source of desires and their satisfaction. If it stops directing\nthoughts, the need to culture the consciousness towards transformation (nirmana\ncitta) does not arise. Patanjali wants everybody to channelise the energies of\nthe multiple mind in the right direction, so that no discrepancies or\ndistortions arise among words, thoughts and deeds. It has already been said\nthat multiple thoughts arise from the sense of ' I' consciousness in the sphere\nof activity. Owing to lack of understanding - avidya, their fluctuations create\ndoubts, confusion, desires and avarice, bringing sufferings that disturb the\nmind. These are 'weeds' of the mind (vyutthana or nirmita citta). By using the\ndiscriminative faculty (mrodha citta) gained through yoga, and analysing the\nfluctuating changes, the weeds are eradicated and a state of silence (prasanta\ncitta), is created - an intermediate state between the original, universal mind\nand the individual mind. In that state of silence, comes a refining and\npurifying spark from within (divya citta). When this occurs, nature becomes a\nreal friend to consciousness culturing and transforming it, with its abundant\nenergies, and cleansing the intelligence of the heart. Intelligence and\nconsciousness then realise that they are one, not disconnected and different,\nand all sorrows and joys reach a culmination. The ego-centred and ego-based\nmind-fields that the Sadhaka constructs consciously, to serve him may exhibit\ndiverse tendencies and may look like many mind-fields. But, in reality, there\nis a single root mind-field behind all of them, which controls all these\ndiverse external expressions or mind-fields. This means, we have come with an\noriginal mind-field, which is the real controller behind all the diverse\nmind-fields that the EGO goes on creating. While the activities of the emergent\nmind fields may be diverse, the one mind is the director of the many. The root\naspect of mind that emerges from individuality or asmita &nbsp;is the core out of which there may emerge many\nclusters of mental identity. All of the mental constructs of who we think we\nare, are false identities that are secondary to that central mental identity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">4.06- - - tatra\ndhyanajam anashayam</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Of these activities of\nconsciousness of perfected beings, only those, which proceed from meditation,\nare free from latent impressions and influences. </span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Having explained the\ncreation by the single mind of multiple thoughts, which disturb the poise of\nthe original mind, Patanjali explains here that this sprouted mind should be\ncultured, tranquillised and silenced through profound meditation. This puts an\nend to the influence of impressions, and liberates the consciousness from\nentanglements with objects seen, heard or known. Meditation not only liberates\nconsciousness from past impressions, but also removes the hindrances towards\nprogressive evolution of the mind. Impressions of attachment and affliction\ncontinue to torture others. These obstacles, lust, anger, greed, infatuation,\npride and jealousy, are the spokes of the emotional wheel. Meditation assists\nto subdue them, so that the emotional centre (the consciousness of the heart)\ncan expand in a new dimension of spiritual growth. Then consciousness will have\nneither merits nor demerits, virtue nor vice, fluctuations nor afflictions. It\nbecomes 'cultured' (samahita citta), and is conducive in experiencing kjnalya. When\nthe constructed mind-fields are many, amongst them, the one born out of\nMeditation is the one which is free from the Karmic impressions of the past.&nbsp; In meditation, we dissolve all other\nmind-fields. Only one original mind, with which we are born cannot be dissolved\nby us in mediation. It is the purest, in which we find no further reflections\nof other mind-fields. From childhood, all impressions that were absorbed by us\nas different mind-fields, will have to be dissolved, just as we peel of layers\nof onion skin, to find nothing remaining at the end of the peeling process. The\noriginal mind has neither any&nbsp; past\nimpressions in it nor has it anything about the future. The whole process of\nmeditation to attain kaivalya is to dissolve these past and future impressions\nconstantly and keep the mind steady in its original state. All thinking stops\nin this process.
