If\nconsciousness were manifold in one's being, each cognizing the other, the\nintelligence too would be manifold, so the projections of mind would be many,\neach having its own memory. Unless there is a spirit behind a mind, there would\nbe no perception in that energy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">4.22- - chiterapratisankramayastadakarapattau\nsvabuddhisanvedanam</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Consciousness distinguishes\nits own awareness and intelligence when it reflects and identifies its source -\nthe changeless seer - and assumes his form. </span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Through the attainment\nof pure consciousness comes knowledge of the unchangeable seer, who rests on\nhis own intelligence and nowhere else. &nbsp;When\nconsciousness no longer fluctuates, then its pure nature surfaces to comprehend\nitself. Consciousness has two facets - one pure, divine and immutable, the\nother changeable, transient and exhibitive. It has no light of its own but acts\nas a medium or agent between the seer and the objects seen. Due to ignorance,\nit does not realise that it is impersonating the seer. But the seer has\nknowledge of the movements of the consciousness. &nbsp;When one facet of consciousness ceases to\noperate, it ends its contact with the external world and stops collecting\nimpressions. The other facet is drawn to the seer, and the two unite.\nIntelligence and consciousness fuse in their abode - the atman, and the soul\ncomes face to face with itself. &nbsp;A dirty\nmirror mists reflection; a clean mirror reflects objects clearly. The illumined\nconsciousness becomes purified and reflects objects exactly as they are. The\nreflector is called bimba-pratibimba vada, or the elucidation of double\nreflection. There is no difference between the source object and the reflected\nimage. The soul reflects the soul. It is the fulfilment of yoga; Citta is\nidentified with the seer. This is svabuddhi samvedanam or intuitive\nunderstanding of the inner voice. &nbsp;An\neveryday instance of human consciousness taking on the absolute quality and\nform of the object one observes is when one gazes into the dancing flames of a\nfire, or at the waves of the sea, or the wind on the tree-tops. One feels\nabsolutely engrossed in watching, without thought or impatience, as if one was\nthe unending waves or the flickering flames, or the windswept trees. Chitta by\nitself has no illuminating power or power of cognition. That Power rests with\nthe Purusha or Consciousness. Purusha is at once self-illuminating and one who\nilluminates the mind as well. Purusha does not operate&nbsp; by himself to experience the world of\nobjects.&nbsp; Purusha experiences the whole\nworld, only through the mind, which operates through the senses. But, Purusha\ndoes not need another illuminator for itself. Purusha stays as the witness of\nall that the mind projects through mind itself. Purusha however undergoes no\nchanges whatsoever by all these inputs from the mind. He remains the unchanging\nwitness. When the mind stays very pure, without the usual colouring of the\nsenses, it receives the illumination from Purusha to the fullest extent, and\nthe cognition process is in its finest form. This means that Chitta now remains\nclean and clear and unwavering. Then, the Chitta\u2019s awareness of the process of\ncognition also is at its peak. It poses no hindrances before the final witness\nof the Purusha in the cognition process. When the unchanging consciousness\nappears to take on the shape of that finest aspect of mind-field, then the\nexperience of one's own cognition process is possible. &nbsp;Consciousness provides the light or life force\nso that the subtlest aspect of mind-stuff can operate, yet like with the mirror,\nit cannot itself be grasped and is unchanging. It is as if the consciousness,\nthough unchanged, wraps itself around the subtle object called mind, and, in\nturn, all of the objects of the mind. This has been described in the beginning\nof the Yoga Sutras as the essential obstacle to be transcended, or\ndisidentified with. &nbsp;The tool must be set\naside: By realizing the extremely subtle nature of how the consciousness allows\nthe mind-field to be active, it is evident that to know the absolute, unchanging\nTruth or Reality, one must let go of even this finest instrument. Through that\nletting go, the experience of the unchanging, eternal consciousness is there,\nstanding alone, and this is the experience of Self-realization. It is the\nmeaning of resting in one's True nature that is introduced in the beginning of\nthe Yoga Sutras . The consciousness of the Purusha is unchangeable; by getting\nthe reflection of it, the mindstuff becomes conscious of the Self. Consciousness\ndistinguishes its own awareness and intelligence when it reflects and\nidentifies its source -- the changeless seer -- and assumes his form. The pure\nconsciousness of the Atman is unchangeable. As the reflection of its\nconsciousness falls upon the mind, the mind takes the form of the Atman and\nappears to be conscious. When the mind is not linked to external objects and it\ndoes not respect an external form to the Perceiver, then it takes the form of\nthe Perceiver itself. Patanjali says that knowledge is not a quality of the\nPurusa. When the mind comes near the Purusa it is reflected, as it were, upon\nthe mind, and the mind, for the time being, becomes knowing and seems as if it\nwere itself the Purusa.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">4.23- - drashtridrishyoparaktan\nchittan sarvartham<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Consciousness,\nreflected by the seer as well as by the seen, appears to be all-comprehending. </span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consciousness, being in\nconjunction both with the seer and the seen, appears to an average individual\nto be all pervading, omniscient and real. When one is cultured and purified,\none realises that consciousness has no existence of its own but is dependent on\nthe seer. As the physical frame is the body of consciousness, therefore\nconsciousness is the body of the seer. Consciousness is the bridge between\nnature and soul, and its conjunction is either illumined by the seer or tainted\nby the seen. The wise yogi frees consciousness from the qualities of nature; he\nkeeps it clean, so that it is reflected without distortion both by the seer and\nthe seen. When the waves of the sea subside, they lose their identities and\nbecome the sea. In the same way, when the waves of the seer - the senses of\nperception, mind, intelligence and consciousness - subside, they lose their\nidentities and merge in the ocean of the seer, for the seer to blaze forth\nindependently. This is the sight of the soul. In iv.22, Patanjali explains that\nconsciousness is no longer a subject but an object. It is not a knower but the\nknown. As it is trained by sadhana towards maturity (paripakva citta), it gains\npurity (suddha citta) through pure intelligence (iuddha buddhi). &nbsp;Until now, consciousness was under the\nimpression that it was the reflector (bimba) and all other images were its\nreflected reflections (pratibvhba). This sutra explains that consciousness in\nits immature state takes itself to be all-powerful and all-pervading, but the\ntruth is that the seer is actually the reflector. Patanjali illustrates that\nthe impersonating consciousness is transformed to the level of the seen, so\nthat both the reflector and its reflection, gitta, are identical. &nbsp;It is said in the Bhagavad Gita (vi.19) that\nas a lamp in a windless place does not flicker, so the sheaths of a cultured\nyogi do not shake. They remain untouched by the wind of desires for the seer to\nreflect his own glorious light, atmajyoti, and to dwell in that light - purusa\njnana. Purusha is the seer and the witness of all that is seen. All objects\nreceived through the senses and the mind are the seen. Chitta or mind receives\nthe inputs and presents before Purusha. On one side,Chitta is colored by the\nPurusha. On the other side, it is coloured by the objects outside, the Drisya.\nThen, the dual colouring on it makes the comprehending process self-enabled and\nclear. Mind always remains the medium through which the Purusha witnesses the\nworld. The mind can now know all that can be known. It can know everything that\ncan be known. But, in reality, it is only a medium and the actual knower\nremains the Purusha. For Patanjali, the Purusha, who rules from behind the\nmind, the mind itself, the world&nbsp; outside\nand the whole cognizing process are all real. Maya enters in when Purusha\u2019s\nexistence is not understood and mind starts thinking that it is the actual\nseer. Therefore, the mind field, which is colored by both seer and seen, has\nthe potential to perceive any and all objects. Coloured by the seer and the\nseen the mind is able to understand everything. The mind is able to perceive\nbecause it reflects both the Atman and the objects of perception. The mind\nfield, which is colored by both seer and seen, has the potential to perceive\nany and all objects.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: small; text-align: justify;\">ISRAEL DOES MASSIVE PROPAGANDA THAT THEIR SUPREME COURT JUSTICE SALIM JOUBRAM IS AN ARAB ? THIS FELLOW RETIRED IN AUG 2017.</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: small; text-align: justify;\">SORRY THIS FELLOW SALIM IN NOT A MUSLIM.&nbsp;</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: small; text-align: justify;\">HE IS A ARAMAIC JEW PRETENDING TO BE A CHRISTIAN</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: small; text-align: justify;\">WHY DONT YOU SEE IF HE IS CIRCUMCISED ?</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: small; text-align: justify;\">The part of the Talmud called the Gemara is in Aramaic ..</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: small; text-align: justify;\">The traditional ketubah (marriage contract) and Jewish divorce document are also in Aramaic.&nbsp;</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: small; text-align: justify;\">The first hymn of the Passover Haggadah, \"This is the bread of our affliction\" is in Aramaic. The prayer for the dead, known as the kaddish is in Aramaic.</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: small; text-align: justify;\">HOW DO I KNOW ?</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: small; text-align: justify;\">KERALA NAMBOODIRIS CREATED ARAMAIC LANGUAGE -- DERIVED THE SCRIPT FROM BRAHMI ( NOT VICE VERSA AS THE WHITE HISTORIAN BASTARDS SAY )-- WRITTEN FROM RIGHT TO LEFT..</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: small; text-align: justify;\">THE DEAD SEA SCROLS ARE NOT JEWISH BUT HINDU ESSENE --SOME ARE WRITTEN IN ARAMAIC</span></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large; font-weight: 700;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div>\n<b>JEWS MUST STOP CLAIMING THAT DEAD SEA SCROLLS REFLECT THEIR GLORY -- SORRY !&nbsp; &nbsp; IT BELONGS TO HINDU ESSENES .</b></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large; text-align: justify;\"></span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; text-align: justify;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/04/apollonius-or-jesus-christ-who-is-real.html</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: small; text-align: justify;\">ESSENES AND NAZARENES ARE NEITHER JEWS NOR CATHOLICS \u2014THEY WERE PAGAN HINDU.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large; font-weight: 700;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div>\n<b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">THE ESSENES AND THE NAZARENES ( NASRANIS OF KERALA) HAVE NOTHING TO DO WITH JUDAISM AND CHRISTIANITY.</span></span></b></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;; font-size: large; text-align: justify;\"></span><span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;; font-size: small; text-align: justify;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div>\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: x-large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">ESSENES MENTIONED IN THE DEAD SEA SCROLLS ARE NOT JEWS-- THEY WERE HINDUS.</span></b></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: small; text-align: justify;\">capt ajit vadakayil</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: small; text-align: justify;\">..</span></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>THIS POST IS NOW CONTINUED TO PART 65, BEL0W-</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/08/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_17.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/08/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_17.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-GMZHrFA9OGQ/V7AkJnTn3vI/AAAAAAABLUc/qrxc9RhnoBskk-T9IF2cWCV-GpstpoTYACLcB/s1600/Photo0135.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-GMZHrFA9OGQ/V7AkJnTn3vI/AAAAAAABLUc/qrxc9RhnoBskk-T9IF2cWCV-GpstpoTYACLcB/s400/Photo0135.jpg\" width=\"317\" /></a></div>\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n..</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "124", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/3458250626802738292/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "8590600284379409604", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2016-08-13T11:08:00+05:30", "updated": "2016-08-13T11:29:11+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNDcxMDY3OTUxNDgwCm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/08/scba-self-contained-breathing-apparatus.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/8590600284379409604", "title": "SCBA , SELF CONTAINED BREATHING APPARATUS ON CHEMICAL TANKERS - CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Deuu3cNiuCU/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/Deuu3cNiuCU?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SCBA consists of a\nportable supply of compressed air contained in a cylinder or cylinders attached\nto a carrying frame and harness worn by the user.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Air is provided to the user\nthrough a face mask which can be adjusted to give an airtight fit. A pressure\ngauge indicates the air pressure in the cylinder and an audible alarm sounds\nwhen the supply is running low . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only positive pressure\ntype sets are recommended to be used in enclosed spaces.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Air is admitted to the\nface mask through a lung demand valve which opens when the user inhales. The\nlung demand valve can be by-passed giving an positive flow of air into the face\nmask. The use of this by-pass valve causes rapid depletion of the air cylinder.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the equipment is of\nthe positive pressure type, no by-pass valve is needed since the air supply\nsystem is designed to keep a positive pressure in the face mask at all times. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When using the\nequipment the following precautions are necessary:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The high pressure test,\nlow pressure test and vacuum test must be conducted. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>HP test</b>: Open the\nbottle valve and check the pressure. Now shut the valve so that only the tubes\nto the face mask is now under pressure. Wait for 2 minutes and check for\npressure drop , which will happen if the connectors are leaking.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>LP test</b>: Now slowly\nremove the air pressure. The audible low pressure alarm or whistle should now\nsound. Remember in some IBC sets, the alarm cannot be triggered by very less\nvolume of air held in the tubes. It will indeed sound when the air bottle comes\nto the requisite pressure of 45 bars. Check this out before you condemn the\nset.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Vacuum test</b>:&nbsp;&nbsp; The face mask must be checked if it gives a\ntight fit on your face. Long beards are discouraged on Chemical tankers. Facial\nhair adversely affects the mask\u2019s seal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The number and types of\noutfits vary between vessels. However, in all cases , the BA sets must be kept\nwell maintained. Read the manufacturers manuals and ensure that operating\ninstructions are laminated and attached to the apparatus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All bottles must be\nnumbered and kept fully charged. Whenever a bottle is discharged, ensure\nrecharging takes place as soon as possible.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Do not allow bottles to become\ntotally discharged. SCBA compressors must be kept in good order. The apparatus\nstowage positions shall be clearly marked .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is essential that\ncrews become thoroughly familiar with the type of apparatus found aboard their\nvessel. Drills should be frequently carried out using the apparatus which must\nbe kept in perfect order and ready for instant use. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SOLAS requires tankers\nto have at least 4 sets.&nbsp; 3 nos\nadditional IBC sets are required on chemical tankers. These must be stored in\neasily accessible ( from outside ) locations. If stored in lockers, the outside\nof the locker doors must be posted with IMO sign to indicate contents. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Breathing apparatus\nmust always be used whenever emergency entry is made into a space which is\nknown to contain toxic gas or smoke, or to be deficient in oxygen. It should\nalso be used if there is a possibility that any of these conditions may exist\nor occur during the period of occupation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Entry into an enclosed\nspace under these conditions should, however, only be permitted in exceptional\ncircumstances and when there is no practicable alternative. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Remember, the air\nsupply of a 1800 litres free air&nbsp; self\ncontained unit will usually only be sufficient for 30 minutes entry time\n(allowing for 40 litres/minute usage).&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The consumption during\nrest is 10 litres a minute light work is around 30 litres per minute while the\nconsumption during heavy strain like firemans lift of an unconscious person is\ngreater than 100 litres/ minute. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The pressure guage must\nbe monitored frequently to check on reserve air. The wearer must report this by\nwalkie talkie.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gas masks and canisters\nof the type which depend on chemical absorbents to protect the user from poisonous\ngases do not give protection against petroleum gas in high concentrations or\nagainst oxygen deficiency. Gas masks do not manufacture or provide oxygen. They\ncan never substitute a breathing apparatus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ample time should be\nallowed for getting out of the hazardous atmosphere. In any event the user must\nleave immediately the low pressure alarm sounds .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the user has reason\nto suspect the efficiency of the equipment he must leave the compartment\nimmediately.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Air bottles must be\nrefilled promptly, after use. The face mask adjucting straps must be kept\nslack. The official plan must be modified if the SCBA sets are not available in\ndifferent parts of the ship and cannot be accessed&nbsp; easily in case of smoke in the accommodation\ndue to fire.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Air cylinders must be\nhydraulically tested every 5 years. Steel carbon composite cylinders must be\nhydraulically tested first after 3 years of construction, and then every 5\nyears.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At least 2 units must\nbe in close proximity to each other, with internal and external access to them,\nconsidering these sets are used in pairs and never alone. All SCBA sets shall\nbe tested and serviced annually by an approved service agency.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-18S5-6aDn6M/V66yqmibAGI/AAAAAAABLT0/uyhc1j67urE4CxxTrdYdcqNf9hQLaNLSwCLcB/s1600/dowDDnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-18S5-6aDn6M/V66yqmibAGI/AAAAAAABLT0/uyhc1j67urE4CxxTrdYdcqNf9hQLaNLSwCLcB/s400/dowDDnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Db380-fQG6E/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/Db380-fQG6E?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/airline-breathing-apparatus-on-chemical.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/airline-breathing-apparatus-on-chemical.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ObfLG1ilrx8/V663G7MsbLI/AAAAAAABLUE/zEAFvIi95hIRwbLyhoXGDWKN73WF8SlwgCLcB/s1600/tanker-bunga-alpinXDEEia-on-fire-3-ships-19270.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"422\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ObfLG1ilrx8/V663G7MsbLI/AAAAAAABLUE/zEAFvIi95hIRwbLyhoXGDWKN73WF8SlwgCLcB/s640/tanker-bunga-alpinXDEEia-on-fire-3-ships-19270.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-hy22ej-GtiY/V66yG8y8E_I/AAAAAAABLTw/UHsQhcXEhlQKn2B443zxwGcLJrw6G9lOACLcB/s1600/downloa0yrd.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-hy22ej-GtiY/V66yG8y8E_I/AAAAAAABLTw/UHsQhcXEhlQKn2B443zxwGcLJrw6G9lOACLcB/s1600/downloa0yrd.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n30 YEARS IN COMMAND<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "45", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/8590600284379409604/comments"}}], "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/MjAxOS0wNC0yMlQxMTozNzoyOS43MjRa\""}
